Leezha nzo na kwaan tub xaa nanyet nzo lo Dios, nle na mod tub xaa nanyet nzo lo Dios, zee gon xaa xtizh Dios. Kwaan nzhekla na nii na nak, nle na mod nak rese xaa, zee nzho mod gon lak xaa xtizh Dios.
Rese kwaane nle na zee gon re xaa wdizh chul, zee noka na gak xaa le gan.
Kwaanzee re gu ne leezha nyu tub karrer rese xaa nrexonn, per tubka xaa nak xaa nle gan. Kwaanzee sbaaka bkee gu zhiin zee le gu gan kwaan zelazh Dios.
Kwaanzee rese xaa nrexonn lo tub karrer nkanap xaa xkwerp xaa lo rese kwaan nawent. Nu nle xaa rese kwaane, zee le xaa gan nebse tub koron kwaan ndexkwaa kwaan lag yag laurel, nu chepse nyeya ta ngoola. Per lee be nkambaz kwaan zelazh Dios lo be, tub kwaan tira dii.
Kwaanzee nye nkee na zhiin, noka nak na tub xaa nye ndil nu nakakeet na panyet lo mbi.
Nteed na kwerp cheen na bid, nle naya zee leya kwaan nzhekla na, zee nagakt na tub xaa nanreket xnaz Dios, mod nza na kwent lo stub naz xaa.
Wech nu bzan, nanzheklat na yenlazh gu: Leezha mroo re xey nu, xaa yilo, Egipto lee xkaw cheen Dios mlu naz lo xaa nu mded xaa Nistoo Naxne lo yo bizh.
Nu snee mded rese xaa zee, modxa mrubnis xaa leen xkaw nu leen nistoo zee ngok xaa tub xaa mreke tich Ches.
Nu rese xaa zee ndaw leeka kwaan mzaa Dios gaw xaa,
nu rese xaa zee ngu leeka nis kwaan mzaa Dios go xaa. Nel cho ke cheen Dios ngu xaa nis. Ke ne nak Jesucrist, xaa nzha kwaan re xaa naz wen.
Mkanap Dios re xaa, nixa nangulat Dios re kwaan mle xaa, kwaanzee zyen doo xaa ngut naz wen.
Rese kwaane mded zee zeen re be nalet be re kwaan nawent, mod mle re xaa zee.
Kwaanzee, nawiit gu lo re maj, kwentaxa mle re xaa zee. Modxa nzaa Xkyech Dios kwent: “Lee re myet mle yalni, ndaw xaa, ngu xaa, zeera nguxso xaa, mkanii xaa nu mbill xaa lo xmaj xaa”. [Ex. 32:6]
Nu nachaalt be sa myet be, mod mle re xaa zee. Kwaane mle zee tubka mbizh ngut tub galbchon mil myet.
Nu nixa nalet be zee zhaal xyan Xaa Nabeyy, modxa mle re xaa zee, zee mkee mball wiza re xaa, zee ngut xaa.
Nu nixa nanzhedizh went be Dios, nel kwaane mle lak re xaa zee, kwaanzee Dios mxaal xmandad xaa zee mbit xaa re xaa zee.
Rese kwaane mded re xey nu xaa yilo, zee ne be nalet be re kwaane, nu mkeeya lo Xkyech Dios zee zeen re be, xaa nzho re mbizh gwluzh ne.
Kwaanzee chelee be nzak be nali nzo be, kanapka be be napaka le be tub kwaan nawent.
Zee lee Maxuu nzhekla kiil be mod nkiil xaa rese myet yizhyo, per Dios nle yudar be nu nanlaat xaa kiil Maxuu be axta paro nayet be. Nu leezha nzhekla Maxuu kiil be, zeera luu Dios tub mod roo be, zee ye be ded beya.
Kwaanzee wech nu bzan, xaa nkela na, tira nawiit gu lo re maj.
Nii na kwaane lo gu mod xaa nzhak, zee nzho mod labeyy gu nen che wli kwaan nii na.
Leezha nzho be xis ub leen bas cheen xchee Xaa Nabeyy, nzaa be dixkix lo Dios, nu leeya nlu lee be tubka nak kwaan Jesucrist lo xren xaa; nu leezha nzhaw be pan, leeya nlu lee be tubka nak kwaan Jesucrist lo kwerp cheen xaa.
Nu nixa zyen doo be, per tubka pan nzhaw re be, kwaanzee lee be nak tubka kwerp.
Bzeen gu xomod mle re sawlazh nu; leezha nzhaw xaa re ma mteed xaa lo Dios, nlu tubka nak xaa lo Dios.
Nu kwaan nzhekla na nii na nak, lee maj nanakt dios, kwaanzee lee baal kwaan nteed xaa lo maj, nebse nak tub kwaan sbaasa.
Kwaan nzhekla na nii na nak, leezha lee re xaa nanakt xaa Dios nteed tub ma lo maj, naleet lo Dios nzaa xaaya, lee xaa kazaaya lo re mbi mal, nu nanzheklat na tubka yo gu kwaan mbi mal.
Nel nyent mod go gu kwaan nzho leen bas cheen xchee Xaa Nabeyy nu go gu kwaan nzho leen bas cheen re mbi mal, nixa nyent mod zob gu gaw gu roo mes cheen Xaa Nabeyy nu zobka gu roo mes cheen re mbi mal.
¿Cho kwaan nzhekla gu le gu? ¿Che nzhekla gu zee yii Xaa Nabeyy ne be? ¡Telisa nyent mod dil be kwaan lee xaa!
Mod nii lak gu: “Libr be, le be rese kwaan”. Wliya, per naret kwaan nak kwaan nzhaal le be. “Libr be le be rese kwaan”, per naret kwaan nle zee nyera zo be lo Xaa Nabeyy.
Nanzhaalt kwaan be zee yo chul leeka be, nzhaal kwaan be zee chul yo stub naz xaa.
Nzho mod gaw be rese baal kwaan nto xaa, nu nanabdizht be nen che naka tub baal kwaan mteed xaa lo maj zee nalet be xgab.
Mod nkee: Lee yizhyo nak cheen Xaa Nabeyy, nu noka rese kwaan nzho leena.
Chelee tub xaa nanakt xaa Jesús kwezh gu gaw gu garli xaa, nu nzhekla gu ya gu, daw gu rese kwaan zaa xaa lo gu, nu nanabdizht gu nen che naka tub kwaan mteed xaa lo maj, zee nalet xaa xgab.
Per chelee tub xaa né lo be: “Lee baal ne mteed na lo maj”, nagawt beya nel nanzheklat be leya, zee lee xaa ne le xgab nawenta.
Kanii na xgab kwaan nzho yek stub xaa, nu nanakta xgab kwaan nzho yek be. Per chelee tub gu nabdizh: “¿Chozhiin naab xaa kwent lo na, libr nak na lo xgab cheen stub xaa?
Nu chelee na nza na dixkix lo Dios gorna gaw naya, ¿chozhiin wdizh nawent re xaa na, nel nzhaw naya?”
Kwaane nkeb na: Rese kwaan nle be, gorna nzhaw be o gorna nzho be, nzhaal le beya zee nii wen re xaa Dios.
Nu nalet be zee lee stub naz xaa le jwalt, nixa re sawlazh nu o re xaa nanakt sawlazh nu, nixa re xaa nak xaa Jesús.
Nu lo rese kwaan nle na, nanzheklat na le na nawent lo stub naz xaa, nu nankwaant na kwaan nyula na, lee na nkwaan kwaan nyula stub naz xaa, zee nzho mod le xaa gan yalnaban cheen xaa.
Ble gu mod nle na, nel nle na mod mle Jesucrist.
Nal nyakla na mbin na nselazh gu na, nu nle gu re kwaan mnabeyy na le gu.
Per nzhekla na, zeen gu lee Jesucrist nabeyy rese xaabyi, nu xaabyi nabeyy ngwnaa, modxa Dios nabeyy Jesucrist.
Nu chelee tub xaabyi saaw yek gorna wdizhno xaa Dios, o gorna nzaa xaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa, nlu xaa nanzhont xaa xtizh Xaa Nabeyy.
Nu chelee tub ngwnaa nasaawt yek gorna nii me lo Dios o gorna nzaa me kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee me, nlu me nanzhont me xtizh sa me. Nu snee lal nle me ke tub me tira mrub yek, kwaane nlu nawent nak me.
Wena, chelee tub ngwnaa nsaaw me yek me, per nawent chuub me yek me. Nel nton me chuub me yek me, zee mas wen saaw me yek me.
Lee xaabyi nanzhaalt saaw xaa yek xaa nel mdexkwaa Dios xaa mod lee xaa nu snee nlu chul nak Dios. Per lee ngwnaa nzhaal saaw me yek me, zee luu nzhon me xtizh sa me.
Sbaa nii na nel namzant ngwnaa xaabyi yilo, sinka lee ngwnaa, me yilo, cho xaabyi mroo me.
Nu lee xaabyi namdexkwaat Dios nel nkin ngwnaa xaa, per lee ngwnaa mdexkwaa Dios nel nkin xaabyi me.
Kwaanzee lee ngwnaa nzhaal saaw me yek me zee luu me lo re mandad cheen Dios, lee me nak tub me nzhon xtizh sa me.
Per lee re be, xaa nzhon xtizh Xaa Nabeyy, lee xaabyi nkin ngwnaa nu sbaaka lee ngwnaa nkin xaabyi.
Nixa wli lee ngwnaa yilo mdexkwaa kwaan tik cho xaabyi yilo, per noka nal wli lee ngwnaa nzan xaabyi, nu xaabyi rop ngwnaa, mdexkwaa Dios.
Nu leeka re gu nzhaal nii, che wen lee ngwnaa wdizhno Dios nu nasaawt me yek me.
Nu leeka re myet yizhyo ne nlu lo re gu lee xaabyi nanzhaalt laa xaa roo yich yek xaa,
nu leeka snee lee ngwnaa nzhaal laa me roo yich yek me, zee saawa yek me, nel leeya nak tub kwaan chul lo me, nel lo lee me mzaa Dios diizh roo yich yek me.
Wena, per chelee tub xaa nanzheklat kayaa kwaane, nzhaal ne xaa, nixa nu, nu nixa re xaa Jesús, nanzaat nu stub kwent lo re kwaane.
Kwaan nii na lo gu nal nak, nanyulat na re kwaan nle gu gorna nkasa gu gool gu lo Dios. Nel leezha nkasa gu nzhaal leya zee nyera zo gu lo Dios, per lo re gu rebes naka.
Nu kwaan yilo, nguné xaa lo na nrexcho gu leezha nkasa gu gool gu lo Dios, nu nzak na wliya.
¿Che nzak gu snee nzho mod luu gu na xana xaa wlipa nreke tich Jesucrist?
Kwaanzee leezha nkasa gu nzhaw gu Xchee cheen Xaa Nabeyy, nanlet guya mod nzhaal le guya.
Nel gorna nzhaw gu, rol gu nzhaw yilo, nu nzhaw gu rese kwaan, nu lee zrol gu seetaka nlaan nu zrol gu tira nzuzh.
¿Che nyent garli gu pa gaw gu nu pa go gu? Nel tira nawent kwaan nle gu lo re xaa Jesús, nu nle gu zee nton re xaa prob ne gu. ¿Cho kwaan nzhekla gu nii na lo gu? ¿Che nzhekla gu nii na chul nle gu? ¡Per na nii, tira nawent nle gu kwaane!
Lee kwaan mseed na lo Xaa Nabeyy noka mlu naya lo gu: Leeka gwzhe kwaan mzaa xaa Xaa Nabeyy yet, lee xaa mzen cha pan,
nu gorna ngulo mzaa xaa dixkix lo Dios mxux xaaya nu nzhé xaa: “Kwaane nak xbaal na, kwaane za na kwent cheen re gu. Ble gu kwaane zee selazh gu xomod yet na.”
Nu leeka snee gorna ngulo ndaw xchee xaa, zee mzen xaa bas, kwaan nzho xis ub leen, nu nzhé xaa: “Lee xis ub kwaan nzho leen bas ne nak xren na cheen wdizh kub kwaan laa Dios lo gu. Kad welt kwaan go guya ble guya zee selazh gu na.”
Nu kad welt kwaan gaw be pan ne nu go be xis ub ne nselazh be xomod ngut Xaa Nabeyy. Nu snee le beya axta bare Xaa Nabeyy.
Nu nii na, loka xaa gaw pan ne o go xis ub ne sbaasa, tira nawent kwaan nle xaa leezha nselazh be xkwerp Xaa Nabeyy nu xren xaa.
Kwaanzee kad tub xaa nzhaal le wen xaa xgab, gorna gaw xaa pan ne nu gorna go xaa xis ub ne.
Nel chelee xaa sbaasa gaw xaa pan nu sbaasa go xis ub, nu nanet xaa cho kwaan naka, sbaa nle xaa zee teed Dios xaa bid.
Nel snee nle zyen gu zee nyent jwers lo gu, nu lak gu ne nzak nu zlak gu axta ngutla.
Nu chelee be le wen be xgab leezha nzhaw be Xchee cheen Xaa Nabeyy, zee nankint teed Dios be bid.
Nu chelee Xaa Nabeyy naab kwent cheen be naka zee seed be, nu nanakta zee tira ded be bid kwaan re myet yizhyo.
Kwaanzee wech nu bzan, leezha gaw be xchee cheen Xaa Nabeyy, kwaz be zee tubka gaw re beya.
Nu chelee tub be nlaan, nzhaal gaw be garli be, zee nakint teed Dios be bid kwent cheen xchee ne. Lee stub naz kwaan mnabdizh gu lo na, luu naya lo gu gorna bare na lo re gu stub welt.
Nal wech nu bzan, nzhekla na za na kwent, zee ne gu chep xomod nak kwaan nzelazh Mbi Naban cheen Dios lo re be, xaa nak xaa Jesús.
Nzhaal ne gu leezha zer gak gu xaa Xaa Nabeyy, mbill gu lo re maj kwaan nambant.
Kwaanzee nal, nzhekla na ne gu nik tub xaa kwaan nzho Mbi Naban lextoo, nyent mod né: “Jesucrist nak Maxuu”. Nu nixa nik tub xaa nyent mod né: “Jesucrist nak Xaa Nabeyy na”, cheleeya nanzhot Mbi Naban cheen Dios lextoo xaa.
Xa nak kwaan nzaa Mbi Naban cheen Dios lo tub be nu lo stub be, nel lee Mbi Naban tubka nak.
Zyen doo mod nkee be xchiin Dios per lo tubka Xaa Nabeyy nkee be zhiin.
Xa kwaan nzelazh Dios lo kad tub be zee kee be xchiin xaa, per lee xaa nak xaa nkee zhiin kwent cheen be.
Lo kad tub be nzelazh Dios Mbi Naban cheen xaa, zee nzho mod le be yudar re xaa Jesús.
Nu kwaan Mbi Naban nzelazh Dios re kwaane: zee tub naz xaa nii kwaan yalnzhak, nu stub naz xaa labeyy cho kwaan nzhekla Dios,
nu stub naz xaa nzho mod wii cho kwaan nzhekla Dios le, nu stub naz xaa sekwen re xaa ne nzak,
nu stub naz xaa nzho mod le zyen doo kwaan gro, nu stub naz xaa nzho mod zaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa, nu stub naz xaa ne xana kwaan nroo lo mbi mal nu lo Mbi Naban, nu stub naz xaa nii stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa, nu stub naz xaa nzho mod zaa kwent cho kwaan ngunii xaa ba,
Per tubka Mbi Naban nzelazh rese kwaane, nu nzaa xaaya lo kad tub be mod nzhekla xaa zaa xaaya.
Nu lee kwerp cheen myet nixa nkanoya zyen pa (kwenta nii xaa, yaa xaa, nzha xaa), per tubka kwerp naka. Nu seeka nak kwerp cheen Jesucrist.
Nu leeka snee rese be, xaa Israel o xaa nanakt xaa Israel, xaa nak mos o xaa nanakt mos, mrubnis be kwaan tubka Mbi Naban zee gak be tubka kwerp, nu leeka Mbi Naban nabeyy leen lextoo rese be.
Lee kwerp nanakta tubka pa, leeya nak zyen pa.
Chol yé nii tub xaa: “Nel nanakt na yaa xaa, nanakt na cheen kwerp”. Nixa sbaa yéya, seetaka naka tub pa cheen kwerp cheen xaa.
Nu chol nzha xaa yé: “Nel nanakt na zaalo xaa, nanakta na cheen kwerp”. Nixa sbaa yéya, seetaka naka tub pa cho kwerp cheen xaa.
Chelee dubse kwerp nak nebse zaalo xaa, nyent mod gon xaa. O chelee dubse kwerp nak nebse nzha xaa, nyent mod koob xaa bech.
Per lee Dios mzob kad pa kwerp cheen be paro mas wen nzhaala nzak xaa.
Cheleeya tubka kwaan ngak dubse xaa, zee nyent kwerp.
Per kwaan wli nak, lee kwerp nkano zyen pa choya per tubka kwerp naka.
Zee lee zaalo xaa nyent mod yé lo yaa xaa: “Nankint na lu”; nixa yek xaa nyent mod yé lo nii xaa: “Nankint na lu”.
Per lee re pa cho be, pa nzak be nanont, leeya nak kwaan mas nkin be.
Nu lee cho be paro nzak be sbaasa, nak paro nzob be kwaan chul nlu. Noka lee cho be pa nanzheklat be luu mas nsegak beya ler,
nu lee pa mas chul nlu nankint tant kanap beya. Per Dios mdexkwaa cho be zee lee paro nzak be mas nachult mas nkanap beya.
Zee nayiit tub pa ne stub pa, zee rese pa cho be kanap stub pa cho.
Chelee tub pa cho be ne nzak, dubse cho be ne; nu chelee tub pa cho be wen nzak, dubse cho be wen nzak.
Nu sbaa nak be mod kwerp cheen Jesucrist, nel kad tub be nak mod tik cho kwerp cheen xaa.
Kwaanzee Dios mzaa lo re xaa Jesús pa nzhaal kee xaa zhiin. Xaa mas non nak xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, nu zeera xaa nzaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa, nu zeera re xaa nseed xtizh Dios, nu gwluzh xaa nle kwaan gro kwaan nyent mod le re myet, xaa nsekwen re xaa ne nzak, xaa nle yudar re xaa nkin kwaan, xaa nabeyy lo re xaa Jesús, xaa nzhedizh stub naz diizh kwaan nagakt xaa.
Naret xaa nak xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, nu nixa naret xaa nzaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa. Naret xaa nseed xtizh Dios, nu nixa naret xaa nle re kwaan gro.
Nu nixa naret xaa nsekwen re xaa ne nzak, nu nixa naret xaa nzhedizh stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa nu nixa naret xaa nzho mod nzaa kwent cho kwaan nzhé xaa zee.
Kwaanzee re gu nzhaal yula gu kayaa gu re kwaan mas wen, kwaan nzelazh Dios. Nal luu na stub naz kwaan mas chul lo re gu.
Chelee na nzhedizh na xtizh re myet kwaan nagakt na, nu axta xtizh mandad cheen Dios per nankelat na wechxinn na, nanont kwaana nii na, nebse mod tub lee yiib kwaan nkee chi naka.
Nu chelee Mbi Naban nzelazh lo na zee za na kwent kwaan né Dios lo na, nu chelee na ne na re kwaan xlaan cheen Dios, nu chelee na nkano na rese yalnzhak, nu chelee na ngwii na lo Dios zee nzho mod nabeey na axta bachii yi, per nankelat na wechxinn na, tira nanont na.
Nu chelee na ngiiz na rese kwaan nkano na lo re xaa nkin kwaan nu za na na yo na lo ki nel nza na kwent xtizh Dios per nankelat na wechxinn na, nanont kwaane.
Xaa nkela: nyela xaa ne xaa rese kwaan nle stub naz xaa lo xaa, nlesla xaa ne xaa stub naz xaa, nanzoblazht xaa cheen stub naz xaa, nanzhedizht xwa xaa nixa nantot xaa yalxwa;
xaa nkela naniit wdizh nawent, xaa nkela nangozhawt xaa rese xcheen xaa para leeka lee xaa, xaa nkela nanzhalxyant, xaa nkela nanselazht re kwaan nle xaa lo xaa,
xaa nkela nanyulat ded stub xaa bid, nu nix doo nzhak lextoo xaa ne xaa re kwaan wli.
Tub xaa nkela: Tubka nyela nded bid, tubka nali nak xaa lo xmig xaa, tubka nkambaz xaa lee stub xaa le kwaan wen, nu tubka nyela xaa lo rese kwaan nle stub xaa lo xaa.
Tira ndii yalnkela. Per stub naz re kwaan nzelazh Dios nankint diiya tira, re kwaan kwenta kwaane: re xaa nzaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa, zhin mbizh nazaatra xaaya; nu lee re xaa nzhedizh stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa, zhin mbizh nawdizhtra xaaya; nu lee re yalnzhak kwaan nzaa Mbi Naban, zhin mbizh nakayaatra xaaya. Rese kwaane nadiit tira.
Nal nanlat rese kwaan yek be, nu noka nzho welt nawent nzaa be kwent rese kwaan nzhekla Dios nii lo be.
Per zhin mbizh leezha bare Xaa Nali, zee nakintra be re kwaan nadiit.
Leezha nyeen na mdizh na nu mle na xgab nu mla kwaan yek na mod tub xaawin, per leezha ngok na tub xaabyi mlaa na rese kwaan nak cheen xaawin.
Nal nanyaniwenta lo be, nlu rese kwaan lo be kwenta leezha ngwii be lo spej beed, per yo tub mbizh kwaan luu reya lo be kwentaxa naka. Nal chepseya nlabeyy naya per mbizh zee tira yilo labeyy naya, kwentaxa tira nlabeyy Dios na.
Nal nkano be chon kwaan ndii: mod ngwii be lo Dios, nu mod nkambaz be re kwaan nguné xaa, nu mod nkela be; per kwaan nonra lo yon kwaane nak yalnkela.
Tubka kela be, nel kwaane nak kwaan nonra. Nu zoblazh be re kwaan nzelazh Dios kwaan Mbi Naban, nu lo reya zoblazhra be zaa be kwent re kwaan né Dios lo be.
Per xaa kwaan nzhedizh stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa, nii xaa lo Dios, nu naniit xaaya lo re myet nel nik tub xaa nanet cho kwaan nii xaa. Lee re xgab kwaan nzho yek xaa nii kwaan Mbi Naban.
Per lee xaa kwaan nzaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa nle xaa zee mas nye nzo stub naz xaa lo Dios, nu nzaa xaa balor lextoo re xaa nu nseleyy xaa xaa.
Lee xaa nzhedizh stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa, nle xaa zee mas nye nzo leeka lee xaa lo Dios, per lee xaa nzaa kwent wdizh kwaan mkayaa xaa lo Dios nle xaa zee mas nye nzo re xaa Jesús lo Dios.
Nzhekla na rese gu wdizh stub diizh, per mas nzhekla na zaa gu kwent kwaan né Dios lo gu, mas wen kwaane ke wdizh xaa stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa. Per noka nzho mod wdizh xaa stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa, chelee stub xaa zaa kwent cho kwaan ngunii xaa lo re xaa Jesús, zee snee mas nye zo kad tub xaa lo Dios.
Kwaanzee wech nu bzan, nyent sirb chelee na ya na lo re gu nu nii na kwaan stub diizh kwaan nagakt gu, lo re gu. Mas wen yal na lo re gu zee nii na kwaan nzhekla Dios né lo re be, o kwaan yalnzhak nii na kwaan wli lo gu, o za na wdizh kwaan nguné Dios lo na, o seed na gu stub kwaan cheen Dios.
Kwaanzee re kwaan nzholl xaa, kwenta bzhik nu kwenta bagwel, cheleeya nakanota mer bi cheena nyent mod labeyy xaa xana tuba stuba.
Nu cheleeya lo dil nakwezh went xaa trompet, nanet re xaa cho gor zelo dil.
Leeka kwaane nded lo re be, chelee be nii be tub diizh kwaan nanlat yek re be, nyent mod ne xaa cho kwaan kanii be. ¡Lo mbi nzhob xtizh be!
Wli nzho zyen doo stub naz diizh lo yizhyo, per nlaya yek xaa niiya.
Per chelee na nanet na cho kwaan nii xaa lo na, mod xaa zit nak na lo xaa, nu leeka xaa zit nak xaa zee lo na.
Nel nzoblazh be kano be kwaan nzelazh Mbi Naban, zoblazh be kano be re kwaan nzho mod le zee nyera zo kad tub xaa Jesús lo Dios.
Kwaanzee lee xaa kwaan nzhedizh stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa, nzhaal naab xaa lo Dios zee nzho mod zaa xaa kwent cho kwaan ngunii xaa.
Kwaanzee leezha nii na lo Dios kwaan stub diizh kwaan nagakt na, nii Mbi Naban kwent cheen na per lee na nanet na cho kwaan kanii na.
¿Nu zee cho kwaan nzhaal le na? Nzhaal nii na lo Dios kwaan Mbi Naban nu noka nzhaal nii na kwaan nla yek na. Nu nzhaal gol na lo Dios kwaan Mbi Naban nu noka nzhaal gol na lo Dios kwaan kwaan nla yek na.
Nel chelee be nii be lo Dios nu zaa be dixkix lo xaa kwaan Mbi Naban snee, nu chelee tub xaa sbaasa kenzhaya, nu nakanot xaa kwaan nzelazh Mbi Naban, nyent mod wdizhno xaa Dios tubka kwaan be, nel nanet xaa cho kwaan kanii be.
Nzho mod zaa be dixkix lo Dios per naleta yudar zo nye stub xaa lo Dios.
Nzaa na dixkix lo Dios nel mas nzhak na nii na stub re diizh ke tub re gu;
per lee lo re xaa Jesús mas wen seed na xaa gaayka wdizh kwaan la yek xaa, ke kwaan chii mil wdizh kwaan nanet xaa ne cho kwaan nii na.
Wech nu bzan, nagakt be mod xaawin mod nle be xgab, per gak be mod tub xaawin lo re kwaan nawent nu naletra beya, per mod nle be xgab gak be xaa gox.
Nel lee Xkyech Dios nzhé: “Nii na lo yezh ne kwaan stub wdizh, nu nii naya kwaan roo xaa zit, nu nixa sneeya nanzhont xaa xtizh na, né Xaa Nabeyy”. [Is. 28:11-12]
Kwaanzee leezha nii be stub diizh kwaan nagakt be, naka mod tub nseyn lo re xaa nanakt xaa Jesús, nu nanakta tub nseyn lo re xaa Jesús. Nu gorna nzaa be kwent kwaan nguné Dios lo be, naka mod tub nseyn lo re xaa Jesús per nanakta mod tub nseyn lo re xaa nanakt xaa Jesús.
Nu gorna nkasa re be, xaa Jesús, nu rese xaa nzhedizh stub diizh nu rep tub xaa nanakt xaa Jesús, xaa nanlabeyyt re kwaan nzelazh Mbi Naban, zle xaa xgab nzhak nachan re be.
Per cheleeya rese be kazaa be kwent re kwaan né Dios lo be, nu rep tub xaa nanakt tub xaa Jesús nu gon xaaya, tub xaa nanlabeyyt re kwaan nzelazh Mbi Naban, zlabeyy xaa jwalt cheen xaa nu leeka lee xaa zeen re kwaan nawent kwaan mle xaa gorna gon xaa re kwaan kazaa be kwent.
Zee zeen xaa re kwaan nzho lextoo xaa, nu snee kichyek xaa axta lo yo nu gool xaa lo Dios, zee zeen xaa lee Dios wlipa nzo kwaan re be.
Wech nu bzan, kwaan nzhekla na nii na lo rese kwaane nak, leezha kasa be gool be lo Dios, lak be nzho mod gool kant, zlak be nzho mod lu xtizh Dios, zlak be nzho mod zaa kwent kwaan ngunii Dios lo xaa, zlak be nzho mod nii stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa, nu zlak be nzho mod yé cho kwaan ngunii xaa kwaan stub diizh, per rese kwaane nzhaal le yudar be, zee mas nye zo be lo Dios.
Nu leezha lee tub xaa nii stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa, nzhaal nii chop xaa o chon xaa, nu kad xaa nii gorna yizo xaa nii xaa, nu noka nzhaal lee stub xaa zaa kwent cho kwaan kanii xaa, xaa kanii stub diizh.
Per chelee lo re be, xaa Jesús, nyent stub xaa zaa kwent cho kwaan kanii xaa, xaa kanii stub diizh, mas wen naniit xaaya lo re xaa, nu mas wen nii xaaya leezha nii techosa xaa lo Dios.
Nu leeka snee lee xaa nzhekla yé kwaan ngunii Dios lo xaa, nzhaal nii chop xaa o chon xaa, nu lee stub naz xaa nzhaal kenzha kwaan kanii xaa, zee ne xaa che naka cheen Dios.
Per chelee Dios nii tub kwaan lo stub xaa nzob lo re xaa zee, lee xaa kanii nzhaal laa nii xaa.
Nu snee kad tub xaa nzhaal nii gorna yizo xaa nii xaa, nzho mod zaa xaa kwent kwaan ngunii Dios lo xaa, zee snee nzho mod seed re xaa nu nzho mod yo balor lextoo re xaa.
Nu gorna nzaa xaa kwent kwaan ngunii Dios lo xaa, nkano xaa yalnabeyy lo kwaan kanii xaa,
nel Dios nak cho nle zee kwi chul re xaa, nel nanzheklat xaa guchniz re kwaan. Ble gu modxa nle rese xaa Jesús, xaa nambey nak,
lee re ngwnaa nanzhaalt nii me leen kult, nel nyent derech nii ngwnaa leen kult. Nzhaal gon me xtizh sa me, kwentaxa nkee lo Xkyech Dios.
Chelee me nzhekla me né me tub kwaan, nzhaal nabdizh meya lo sa me garli me, nel nawent nak lee tub ngwnaa nii leen kult.
Nu tubka bselazh gu xtizh Dios, nel namzhinta yilotlaka lo re gu, nu nixa nanebt gu mkayaaya.
Chelee tub xaa nzak nak xaa tub xaa nzaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa o nak xaa tub xaa mkayaa tub kwaan lo Mbi Naban, nzhaal zaa xaa yek xaa gon xaaya, lee kwaan kakee na lo gu nak kwaan mxaal Xaa Nabeyy.
Nu chelee xaa nagont xaa kwaane, noka nagont gu re kwaan yé xaa.
Nu sbaaka wech nu bzan, bzoblazh gu zaa gu kwent kwaan ngunii Dios lo gu, nu noka laa gu zee nii xaa stub diizh kwaan nagakt xaa;
per ble gu re kwaane tub mod chul, mod nzhaal le guya.
Lee nal wech nu bzan, nzhekla na selazh gu wdizh chul kwaan mza na lo re gu, wdizh kwaan mkayaa re gu, lo kwaan nali nzo gu.
Nu noka Kwent Chul ne mle zee le gu gan yalnaban, nel nzhon gu re kwaan nzhéya; per chelee gu nagont gu kwaan nzhéya, nik tub kwaan nakayaat gu lo Dios.
Lee wdizh kwaan mseed na re gu nak leeka kwaan mseed na lo Jesucrist nu naka tub kwaan non doo. Lee wdizh ne nak: Jesucrist ngut kwent cheen jwalt cheen re be, modxa nkeeya lo Xkyech Dios;
nu mkaach xaa xaa nu leezha mzhaal yon mbizh lee xaa mroban, modxa nkeeya lo Xkyech Dios;
yilotlaka mlu xaa lo Pér, zeera mlu xaa lo re xchiibtub xaa mseed lo xaa.
Nu gwluzh zeera mlu xaa lo kan tub gaay gayoo wech nu bzan, nu zyen doo xaa ne ngune lee xaa mbanaka nal, per noka nzho lak xaa ngune lo xaa ngutla nal.
Nu gwluzh zeera mlu Jesús lo Chag nu lo re xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo xaa.
Nu noka lo na mlu xaa axta gwluzhtlaka, nel na nak mod tub mad mded mbizh gal.
Nel na nak xaa mas tira nanont lo re xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, nu nixa nanzhaalt role na tub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, nel na mrenal re xaa Jesús.
Per nak na kwaan nak na nel mlesla Dios ne na, nu kwaan yalnkela cheen xaa nangokt na tub xaa sbaasa. Lee na mas nzhakee zhiin ke rese stub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, per wlipa natechot na mle rese kwaane, xaa mleya nak Dios, nu kwaan yalnkela cheen xaa mle xaa yudar na.
Kwaanzee nanont che naya o che stub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, mzaa nu kwent kwaane lo gu, kwaan non nak mbin guya.
Mod mzaa nu kwent, lee Jesucrist mroban. ¿Chozhiin nii lak gu lee re xaa ngut narobant?
Nel chol lee re xaa ngut narobant, zee noka Jesucrist nangrobant xaa.
Nu chol nangrobant Jesucrist, zee nanont kwaan nzaa nu kwent, nu nixa nanont mod ngwii be lo Jesús.
Nu chol nangrobant Jesucrist, lee nu nak xaa nkade, nel leeka re nu né lee Dios mseban Jesucrist. Nu sbaa nkade nu chol nawlit roban re xaa ngut.
Nel chol narobant re xaa ngut, noka Jesucrist nangrobant;
nu chol namrobant Jesucrist, zee nanont mod ngwii be lo Jesús, zee lee re jwalt cheen be seetaka nzhib tich be.
Nu chol snee naka, zee lee re xaa ngut, xaa mwii lo Jesucrist, tira ngulo mlux xaa.
Chol nreke be tich Jesucrist nebse kwent cheen kwaan kayaa be yizhyo ne, be nak xaa mas nales doo lo rese myet.
Per kwaan wli nak lee Jesucrist mroban. Lee xaa nak kwenta xle kwaan nzaa yag yilo, kwaan nak mod tub gon lo Dios; nel lee xaa nak xaa yilotlaka mroban.
Nel nebse jwalt cheen tub xaabyi, xaa le Dan, mle mrep yalgut lo yizhyo; sneeka nebse kwaan wen kwaan mle stub xaabyi, xaa le Jesús, nzho yalmroban cheen re xaa ngut.
Nu snee modxa yet rese be nel nak be mod Dan, sneeka rese be roban nel nak be mod Jesucrist.
Per kad tub be roban gorna nzhaal roban be; yilotlaka Jesucrist mroban zeera roban re xaa xaa gorna bare xaa.
Gorzee lux yizhyo nu lee Jesucrist kiib rese yalnabeyy cheen re myet, nu cheen rese mbi mal, nu cheen Maxuu, nu zaa xaa yalnabeyy ne lo Dios, xaa nak Xuz be.
Nel lee Jesucrist nzhaal nabeyy axta le xaa gan lo rese xaa nayii ne xaa,
nu gwluzhtlaka kiib xaa yalnabeyy cheen yalgut.
Mod nii Xkyech Dios: “Dios mle zee nabeyy xaa rese xaa nu rese kwaan”. [Sal. 8:6] Naniit kwaane lee Jesucrist nabeyy Dios.
Per gorna nabeyy xaa rese kwaan, zee laa xaa nabeyy Dios xaa. Nu snee lee Dios, xaa mzaa yalnabeyy lo Xgann xaa, gak Xaa Nabeyy lo rese xaa nu lo rese kwaan.
Nu chol narobant myet, ¿chozhiin nrubnis lak xaa, kwent cheen re xaa ngut?
Nu chol sbaa naka, ¿chozhiin nle nu reyez yet nu rese mbizh?
Kwaanzee wech nu bzan, yizata mbizh nzho reyez yet na. Wli kwaane, nu noka wli nyula na ne na xomod nye nzo gu lo xcheen Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be.
Nu chol nebse kwent cheen na mdil na kwaan re xaa mrixyan kwenta ma nakap, yezh Éfeso, ¿cho sirb leya cheleeya narobant be? Chol wli lee re xaa ngut narobant, mas wen le be mod nii re xaa: “¡Gaw be nu go be nel yee yet be!”
Nalaat gu kade xaa gu. Modxa nzhé xaa: “Lee re xmig xaa nawent, nle zee nle xaa kwaan nawent”.
Ble gu xgab kwaan wli, nu nalet gu kwaan nawent, nel nzho xaa nanlabeyyt Dios. Nii na kwaane zee ton gu.
Kwaanzee lak gu mbezh: “¿Xomod gak kwerp cheen re xaa roban? ¿Cho klas kwerp kano xaa?”
Kwaane nak tub yalnabdizh nachan, nel ne wen be leezha ngo be tub bizh lo yo, nzhaal lux xaba zeera gaka tub xan yag.
Lee kwaan ngo be nanakt yag, kwaan ngo be nak tub bizh zee xena, tub bizh cheen nzhobxtil o stub lo re bizh.
Per Dios xeena mod nzhekla xaa, nu kad bizh zaa yag kwaan nzhaal gaka.
Naret baal lal nak, tuba nak xcheen myet stuba nak xcheen ma, nu stuba nak xcheen mbyin nu stuba nak xcheen mbal nistoo.
Nu leeka snee nzho kwerp naz yiba, nu noka nzho kwerp yizhyo. Chul nak re kwerp kwaan yiba per nalalt chul naka kwaan re kwerp cheen yizhyo.
Lee xni mbizh xa nak ke xni mbee, nu ke xni cheen re mbal yiba; nzho tub mbal xa xni cheen ke re stub naz mbal.
Nu sneeka gak yalmroban cheen re myet. Lee kwaan nyubyo lux per lee kwaan roban tira nanluxtra.
Lee kwerp kwaan ngubyo nak tub kwaan nachult, lee kwerp kwaan roban nak tub kwaan chul doo. Lee kwerp kwaan ngubyo nak tub kwaan nangezht nu lee kwerp kwaan roban nak tub kwaan ngezh doo.
Lee kwerp kwaan ngubyo nak kwerp cheen yizhyo nu lee kwerp kwaan roban nak kwerp cheen yiba. Nu mod nzho kwerp cheen yizhyo, sbaaka nzho kwerp cheen yiba.
Kwaan nzhé Xkyech Dios: “Dan, xaabyi yilotlaka, Dios mle mban xaa”; [Gn. 2:7] per Jesucrist, ngok mod Dan xaa yilo; mzhin xaa naz yiba zee zaa xaa yalnaban.
Nu lee kwerp kwaan yilo nanakt kwerp kwaan nzho mod yo yiba, kwaan yilo nak kwerp cheen yizhyo, kwaan gwluzh nak kwerp cheen yiba.
Lee xaabyi, xaa yilotlaka mdexkwaa Dios kwaan yo, kwaanzee nak xaa xaa yizhyo, lee stub xaabyi mroo naz yiba.
Lee kwerp cheen xaa yizhyo nak mod kwerp cheen xaabyi, xaa mdexkwaa Dios kwaan yo; lee xaa nya naz yiba kano stub kwerp cheen xaa kwaan nzho mod yo naz yiba, mod kwerp cheen xaa myaad naz yiba.
Nel nzhak be mod xaabyi, xaa kwaan mdexkwaa kwaan yo, seeka gak be kwenta xaabyi, xaa myaad naz yiba.
Kwaan nzhekla na nii na lo re gu wech nu bzan, nak tub kwaan ngulaan axta yilo: Lee kwerp kwaan nak baal, nyent mod repa pa nabeyy Dios, nu lee kwerp kwaan nlux nyent mod zhaal kwaan re kwaan nanluxt.
¡Bkenzha gu! Nii na tub kwaan nagakt re myet lo gu: Naret be yet, per rese be zhee.
Gorna kwezh bi cheen trompet kwaan gwluzhtlaka ¡tas zhee re be! Nel kwezh trompet zee lee re xaa ngut roban, zee bare xaa ban xaa tira.
Nel lee xkwerp be kwaan nlux nzhaal gak tub kwerp kwaan tira naluxt; nu xkwerp be kwaan nzhet nzhaal gak tub kwerp kwaan tira nayeta.
Nu gorna lee xkwerp be kwaan nlux gak tub kwerp kwaan naluxt, nu gorna lee xkwerp be kwaan nzhet gak kwaan tira nayeta, zee mbarlo kwaan nzhé lo Xkyech Dios: “Nal lee yalgut tira mlux, nu lee yalnaban mle gan”. [Is. 25:8]
“¿Ma yalnabeyy cheen lu, yalgut? Lee yalgut nik tub kwaan nyent mod le lo be.” [Os. 13:14]
Lee yalgut nabeyy lo re myet nel nle re myet jwalt, nu lee re myet nle jwalt nel nyent mod le xaa kwaan nzhé ley cheen Ches.
¡Per dixkix Dios, mla xaa be lo yalgut kwent cheen Jesucrist!
Nu kwaanzee wech nu bzan, re gu xaa nkedoola na, tubka nali zo be lo Dios nu tubka nye zo be lo Dios, nu tubka kee be zhiin lo xchiin Xaa Nabeyy, nel ne re be lee zhiin kwaan kale be nanakta tub zhiin sbaasa.
Nal za na kwent cheen gon kwaan le gu yudar re xaa mle nambey Jesús. Btop guya modxa nzhé na lo re xaa Jesús, xaa re yezh cheen Galacia.
Yizata dming, kad tub gu nzhaal koxa paro mle gu gan, zee koxa gu laka zee gorna zhin na nankint top beya gor zee.
Nu gorna zhin na nzhekla na kweey gu lak xaa xaal na yezh Jerusalén yilaa gon ne, zee za na tub yech lo xaa yilaa ayud ne.
Nu chelee na nkin ya na, ya re nu xaa ne.
Lee byaj kwaan le na, nkin deed na naz re yezh Macedonia, nu gorna yilo deed na Macedonia zhin na lazh gu.
Nu nle na xgab kwaz na lo re gu lak mbizh, o cheleeya nzho moda kwaz na lo re gu re mbee kwaan nla nal, zee nzho mod xaal re gu na pa nkin ya na gwluzh.
Nanzheklat na nebse deed na lo re gu, nzhekla na kwaz na lo re gu lak mbee chelee Xaa Nabeyy nzhekla,
per kwaz na yezh Éfeso, axta yilo ded yalni cheen Pentecostés,
nel nee nzak na nzho mod le na xchiin Xaa Nabeyy, nu nzak na nee nzho mod le na tub kwaan gro, nixa zyen doo xaa nayii ne na nee nu nzhekla xaa saaw xaa na naz.
Nu cheleeya zhin Timoteo lo gu, ble gu zee chul yo xaa lo re gu, nel lee xaa nkee xchiin Xaa Nabeyy, mod na.
Kwaanzee bkayaa gu xaa; nkin le gu yudar xaa zee chul ya xaa xnaz xaa, zee nzho mod yaadsewii xaa lo na, nel nkambaz na xaa nee kwaan re stub naz re wech be nu re bzan be.
Nal lee wech Apolos nixa ngunaab na lo xaa yaadsewii xaa lo re gu kwaan re wech nu re bzan, per nanet xaa ya xaa nal, per gorna nzho moda lo xaa, zee yaad xaa.
Tubka bkanap gu gu, nu nye bzo gu lo xcheen Xaa Nabeyy. Tubka blo gu balor lextoo gu nu nye bzo gu.
Nu rese kwaan le gu, ble guya kwaan yalnkela.
Wech nu bzan, lee re gu ne lee re sawlizh wech Estéfanas nak xaa yilotlaka mwii lo Jesucrist xkyizhyo gu, kwaan nak Acaya, nu lee re xaa tubka nle yudar re xaa Jesús, xaa nambey.
Wech nu bzan, nzhekla na gon re gu xtizh re xaa kwenta lee xaa, noka gon gu xtizh rese xaa nle yudar re xaa Jesús, nu noka rese xaa snee nkee zhiin.
Nu nyakdoola na nze wech Estéfanas, wech Fortunato nu wech Acaico nee, kwent cheen re gu, zee le xaa yudar na.
Mseleyy doo re wech ne na, kwentaxa nseleyy xaa gu. Nzhaal wii gu respet lo re xaa kwenta re xaa ne.
Lee re xaa nak xaa Jesús, xaa nzho naz re yezh cheen Asia nxaal “dix” lo re gu. Noka Aquila nu sa xaa Priscila, nu re xaa nkasa garli xaa, nxaal re xaa “dix” lo re gu, nel rese gu nak xaa Xaa Nabeyy.
Bkayaa gu “dix” cheen rese wech nu rese bzan, xaa nzo nee, nu guzh gu “dix” lo re wech nu re bzan xaa naz baa, nu daw gu tub bit tagarlo xaa tub mod nali.
Na nak Pab nu kakee na nebse “dix” ne lo re gu kwaan xletr na, kwaan mer yaa na.
Nu chelee tub xaa nankelat Xaa Nabeyy, xobde Dios xaa zee. ¡Te lo re nu, Xaa Nabeyy!
Nu nzhekla na lee Xaa Nabeyy kanap rese gu lo yalnkela cheen xaa.
Nkeladoo na rese gu nel rese be nkela Jesucrist. Sbaa gaka. Pab
Na nak Pab, nu na nak tub re xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist nel sbaa nzhekla Dios. Tubka kwaan wech Timoteo, kakee na yech ne lo re gu, xaa mle nambey Jesús, xaa nzho yezh Corinto, nu lo re xaa mle nambey Jesús, xaa nzho dub naz ba pa nak yizhyo cheen Acaya.
Nzhekla na lee Dios, xaa nak Xuz be, nu Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be, luu xaa yalnkela cheen xaa lo re gu nu le xaa zee kwi wen re gu.
Gool be lo Dios, xaa nak Xuz be nu xaa nak Xuz Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be, nel lee xaa nak xaa nlesla ne re be, nu Dios nak xaa tubka nseleyy be.
Nu nseleyy Dios be gorna kaded be bid, zee noka re be seleyy re xaa kaded bid; nu seleyy be xaa kwentaxa mseleyy Dios be.
Nel nded be bid mod mded Jesucrist bid, sbaaka nseleyy Dios be kwent cheen Jesucrist.
Kwaanzee chelee nu nded nu bid, nded nu bid zee lee re gu leyy, nu le gu gan yalnaban kwaan tira; nu cheleeya Dios nseleyy nu, naka zee noka lee re gu leyy, zee noka gu ye ded bid kwaan nded nu.
Kwaan né nu nak, modxa nded gu bid sbaaka nded nu bid, per sbaa noka re gu nseleyy Dios modxa nseleyy xaa nu.
Wech nu bzan, nzhekla nu ne gu gro doo bid mded nu yizhyo Asia. Kwaane nak tub yalzi, tub yalzi kwaan mer nyent mod ngle nu gan ngded nu, nu axta mle nu xgab ngyet nu.
Mzak nu nak nu mod tub xaa naklakwent yet. Per kwaane mle sirb zee mseed nu nawiit nu leeka lo nu, sinka nkin wii nu lo Dios, xaa nseban re xaa ngut.
Dios mkanap nu leezha nzhekla re xaa ngut nu, nu ne nu tubka sbaa kanap xaa nu lo rese kwaan.
Nu chelee re gu naab gu lo Dios, telisa kanap xaa nu; nu seeka zyen xaa nzaa dixkix lo Dios mod mkanap xaa re nu, kwent cheen kwaan ngunaab zyen xaa lo xaa.
Nzeen nu naz leen lextoo nu lee rese kwaan mle nu lo re myet yizhyo, mle nuya tub mod nali nu kwaan dub lextoo nu, nel Dios mle yudar nu, zee masra mle nuya lo re gu. Nu kwaanzee nix doo nzhak lextoo nu, nel kwaan mle nu lo re gu namlet nuya mod nzhak xaa yizhyo ne nel Dios mle yudar nu.
Nu lo re xkyech nu nankeet nu nik tub kwaan zee kade nu gu, zee nalata yek gu. Nzhekla na klar laya yek gu.
Nixa nal gor ne nanlabeyyt gu nu wen wen, nzhekla na leezha bare Jesucrist Xaa Nabeyy be, lee re gu nzho mod to gu yalxwa cheen re nu modxa noka re nu to yalxwa cheen re gu.
Nel nela na sbaa naka, nzhekla na yilotlaka lo re gu ngal na, zee nzho mod ngzhaal re be stuba, ngak rop welt.
Kwaanzee mle na xgab ngdeed na lo re gu gorna ngwa na naz yizhyo Macedonia nu noka ngdeed na lo re gu gorna ngbare na stuba, zee ngle re gu yudar na nga na naz yizhyo Judea.
Nu gorna mle na xgab ngle na kwaane, mle wen na xgaba. Nu nanlet na xgab mod re xaa yizhyo ne, xaa mbezh le xaa tub kwaan nu nanlet xaaya.
Nel lee Dios nali nak lo rese kwaan, sbaaka re nu nali nak nu lo rese kwaan nii nu lo re gu.
Nel leezha yon nu Silban nu Timoteo nzaa nu kwent cheen Jesucrist, Xgann Dios lo re gu, mzaa nuya tub mod nali, nel tubka wli nak Jesucrist.
Nel rese kwaan né Dios, telisa nle xaaya. Nu snee kwent cheen Jesucrist nzho mod yé be: “Sbaa gaka”, nu sbaa nzho mod gool be lo Dios.
Nu Dios nak xaa nle zee nye nzo rese be lo Jesucrist, nu mleey xaa be zee tubka yo be kwaan Jesucrist,
nu mzaa xaa Mbi Naban cheen xaa lo be zee luu nak be xaa xaa, nu sbaa nzho mod ne be telisa kayaa be re kwaan zaa xaa lo be gwluzh.
Nu chelee na zeeraka ya na yezh Corinto mrop welt mod nak xgab cheen na, zoob na Dios mod tub testig, nagat na nel nanzheklat na galno na re gu.
Nu nanzheklat nu nabeyy nu gu xomod nzhaal ngwii gu lo Dios, nel nye nzo gu lo Dios ngwii gu lo xaa, nebse nzhekla nu le nu yudar gu zee chul gak lextoo gu.
Kwaanzee nanzheklat na ngal na lo re gu stuba, zee le na gak nales lextoo gu.
Nel chelee na le nales na lextoo gu, ¿cho le zee gak chul lextoo na, cheleeya nanakta re gu?
Kwaanzee mkee na yech zee lo gu, nel nanzheklat na ngal na zee gak nales lextoo na, ne na xomod nle gu. Mas wen ble nix gu lextoo na zee nix gak lextoo rese be.
Per gorna mkee na yech zee, nyentra gan lextoo na nu nales doo ngok lextoo na, nu axta mbinn na. Per nanzheklat na kee naya zee gak nales lextoo re gu, nel mkee naya zee ne gu wlipa nkela na gu.
Nu chelee tub xaa mle zee ngok nales lextoo na, nanebt lextoo na mle nales xaa, noka mle nales xaa lextoo rese gu. Nii na kwaane: Nanzheklat na gak na tub xaa nakap doo lo xaa.
Wen mod mted gu xaa bid, lee nal natedtra gu xaa bid.
Nal nzhaal les lextoo gu ne gu xaa zee, nu seleyy gu xaa, napa nales doo nzhak lextoo xaa.
Kwaanzee nzhaal luu gu lo xaa xomod nkela gu xaa.
Nel mkeela na kwaane lo re gu yilo, zee ne na nen che zon gu xtizh na kwaan mnabeey na.
Lee xaa kwaan nles lextoo gu ne gu, noka na nles lextoo ne xaa. Nu nles lextoo na ne na xaa kwent cheen Jesucrist, zee wen yo rese gu.
Nu snee mles lextoo na ne na xaa, zee nyent mod le Maxuu gan lo re be, nel nela be xomod nak re xgab cheen Maxuu.
Gorna mzhin na yezh Troas, za na kwent cheen wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist, ngune na nzho mod chul kee na xchiin Xaa Nabeyy baa.
Per nyent gan lextoo na ngza na kwent nel nanguzhalt wech Tito lo na, nel zeeraka bare xaa lo re gu. Kwaanzee mroo na baa nu mya na naz yizhyo Macedonia.
¡Dixkix Dios, xaa tubka nle zee nyent mod le stub xaa gan lo nu, kwent cheen kwaan mle Jesucrist! Nu kwent cheen nu nle Dios nrech kwent cheen Jesucrist zee labeyy re xaa xaa, kwaan nzharech zyen doo yezh mod tub bech;
nel Dios mle zee lee re nu nak mod bech cheen Jesucrist, kwaan nzhin lo re xaa kale gan yalnaban nu lo re xaa kalux.
Nu lo re xaa kalux, lee bech cheen Jesucrist nak tub bech naxinn doo; per lo re xaa kale gan yalnaban, lee bech ne nak tub bech chul doo nzebech, kwaan nzaa yalnaban kwaan tira. Nu techosa nu nyent mod le nu kwaane.
Nu nakalet re nu negos lo Kwent Chul cheen Dios, modxa nle zyen xaa; per nela Dios, kwaan dub lextoo nu nle nuya, nel Dios mxaal nu zaa nu kwent cheen Jesucrist.
Leezha nii nu kwaane, talbes nzak gu nto nu yalxwa nel mxaal Dios nu lo gu. Nawent nle gu xgab nel nzak gu nkin luu nu tub yech lo gu, nel Jesucrist mzaa yalnabeyy lo nu, kwaanzee nankint naab nu tub yech lo gu gorna zaa nu kwent cheen Jesucrist stub naz yezh.
Re gu nak mod tub yech kwaan nzaa kwent mkayaa na yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist; nel kwent cheen Jesucrist nkee lextoo gu, kwaan nzho mod lab rese xaa nu laya yek xaa.
Leeya nlu lee re gu nak mod tub yech kwaan mkee Jesucrist, nel mkayaa gu kwent kwaan mzaa nu lo gu. Gu nak mod tub yech kwaan namkeet kwaan lap, sinka gu nak mod tub yech kwaan mkee kwaan Mbi Naban cheen Dios, xaa wlipa mban; nu re wdizh ne namkeet xaaya lo ke mod kwaan mzaa Dios lo Ches, sinka lee xaa mkeeya leen lextoo re myet.
Delant lo Dios klar doo mlu Jesucrist kwaane lo nu, leeya nak kwaan wli.
Nyent mod yé nu techosa nu mle re kwaane, nel Dios nzaa re kwaan, zee nzho mod le nuya.
Nel Dios mseed nu nkee nu zhiin lo wdizh kub kwaan mlaa xaa. Nanakta tub wdizh kwaan mkee lo tub ke, mod nak ley kwaan mzaa Dios lo Ches; leeya nak wdizh kwaan mkee Mbi Naban leen lextoo re myet. Lee ke kwaan mkee ley lo nle nzhet myet, per lee Mbi Naban cheen Dios nzaa yalnaban lo myet.
Lee ley kwaan mkee lo ke, mzaa Dios kwaan tub xni gro doo lo Ches nu kwaanzee lee xey nu, xaa dii cheen Israel, nyent mod wii garlo Ches, nel nla doo xni garlo xaa. Per nixa nkee xni ne garlo xaa nyuyya. Lee ley zee nak kwaan nle zee nzhet re myet. Nu Dios mzaa kwaane tub mod chul doo,
per mas chul mlaa xaa wdizh kub cheen Mbi Naban.
Nel lee ley kwaan naab kwent lo re myet, Dios mzaaya tub mod chul doo, ¡per mas chul doo mlaa xaa wdizh kub kwaan nle zee nali nzo be lo Dios!
Nel lee xni cheen ley kwaan yilo, nik tik nanzhakta kwenta xni cheen wdizh kub.
Nu lee xni cheen ley kwaan mzaa Dios lo Ches myuyy, per lee xni cheen wdizh kub grora nu tira nanyuyyt.
Nu nel ne nu wli kwaane, kwaanzee kwaan dub lextoo nu nzaa nu kwenta lo gu.
Nu nanlet nu mod mle Ches, leezha msaaw xaa garlo xaa kwaan tub lee ler, zee lee re xey nu nawiit xomod nzheyuyy xni garlo xaa.
Nu noka myaww yek re xey nu. Nu nixa axta nal nanlat wdizh gox ne yek re sawlazh na, xaa Israel, nel nanzaat xaa yek xaa gon xaaya leezha nlab xaaya. Nu naka mod nsaaw tub lee ler yek xaa nu nanlaata wii xaa, nel zer kwe xaa ler ne yek xaa; nu kwaane yiib leezha wii xaa lo Jesucrist.
Kwaanzee axta mbizh ne gorna nzhon xaa nlab xaa ley kwaan mzaa Dios lo Ches, seetaka nsaaw ler zee yek xaa, zee nanlat xtizh Dios yek xaa.
Per gorna lee tub xaa nzelo ngwii lo Xaa Nabeyy ngiib ler zee yek xaa, zee laya yek xaa.
Nu lee Xaa Nabeyy nak Mbi Naban; nu leezha nabeyy Mbi Naban cheen Xaa Nabeyy lextoo xaa, mla xaa lo ley.
Kwaanzee lee lo re be nyentra ler kwaan nsaaw garlo be, nak be mod tub spej kwaan nlu xni cheen Xaa Nabeyy, nu Mbi Naban cheen Xaa Nabeyy kachee be, zee gak be kwenta lee xaa, zee kad mbizh nzhiroo be lo xni cheen xaa.
Kwaanzee lee re nu tubka nye nzo nu, nel lee Dios, kwaan yalnles cheen xaa, mzaa xaa zhiin ne lo re nu.
Nu mlaa nu re yalnto kwaan nle xaa xlaan; nixa nankadet nu, nixa nancheet nu xtizh Dios. Dios ne wen, wli nu re kwaan nzhedizh nu, snee lee re myet nzho mod ne xomod nak kwaan wli.
Nu chelee wdizh chul kwaan nzaa nu kwent lo re myet, nanlat yek xaa, naka nel leeka lee xaa nle zee nya xaa lo ki.
Nel lee Maxuu, xaa nabeyy yizhyo ne, mle syeg re xaa nanet wii lo Jesucrist, zee nyent mod wii xaa lo xni cheen wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist, xaa nak lal ke Dios.
Nanzaat nu kwent cheen leeka nu, lee nu nzaa kwent cheen Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be. Nebse nak nu xaa nkee zhiin lo re gu, kwent cheen Jesucrist.
Nel leeka Dios, xaa ngunii zee yo xni lo yalnakaw, nak xaa mle yo xni lextoo be, zee nzho mod wii be lo xni cheen Dios, kwaan nak Jesucrist.
Nu lee xni ne nzho leen lextoo be. Per mod tub yas yo nak be, zee luu lee yalngezh ne nak cheen Dios nu nanakta cheen be.
Nu nixa nzhin yalzi lo be mod tub kwaan ntaaw yas, per nanakta tub kwaan lux be. Nu nixa nle doo be xgab per wen lextoo be.
Nu nixa nrenal xaa be, per natechot be nzo, nu nixa gobi xaa be per naluxt xaa be.
Nu nixa pa nzha be nzho ryez yet be, zee luu yalnaban cheen xaa leen kwerp cheen be.
Nel lee re be tubka nzho reyez yet be kwent cheen Jesucrist, zee luu yalnaban cheen xaa leen kwerp cheen be, kwaan yet.
Nu nii na, konxa nzo yalgut kwaan re nu, seeka nzo yalnaban kwaan re gu.
Nel stub pa nzhé: “Ngwii na lo Dios, kwaanzee nza na kwent cheen xaa”, [Sal. 116:10] zee snee nzaa re be kwent cheen Jesucrist nel ngwii be lo Dios.
Nel ne be Dios mseban Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be lo yalgut, noka seban xaa re be kwaan lee xaa, zee wee xaa rese be zee zo be kwaan lee xaa.
Rese kwaane mded zee chul yo rese gu, nu snee zyenra xaa kayaa kwaan nzhekla Dios zaa xaa lo xaa nu tubka zaa xaaya lo rese be, sneeka zyen xaa zaa dixkix lo Dios lo rese kwaan chul kwaan mzaa xaa.
Kwaanzee nalet be xgab. Nixa yizata mbizh nzheyex kwerp cheen be per lee lextoo be yizata mbizh nyera nzheyak lo Dios.
Nagrot nak bid kwaan nded be nu nadiita tira, per leeya nle kwaan chul lextoo be zee kano be tub yalnaban kwaan tira, tub yalnaban pa nabeyy xni cheen Dios, kwaan chulra lo rese kwaan.
Kwaanzee nangwiit be lo re kwaan nlu, lee be ngwii lo re kwaan nanlut, nel lee re kwaan nlu lux, per lee re kwaan nanlut tira naluxt.
Lo yizhyo ne lee kwerp cheen be nak mod tub ramad kwaan nlux. Per nela be gorna luxa, Dios zaa stuba kwaan tira naluxt lo be naz leen yiba, kwaan nak mod tub yoo kwaan namdexkwaat myet.
Kwaanzee nal nzilextoo be nzho be leen kwerp cheen be, nel nzhekla be segak be be kwaan kwerp kub kwaan tira naluxt,
kwaan gak be mod tub ler zee nagakcheeyt be.
Nu leezha seetaka nzho be leen kwerp cheen be, nales doo nzhak lextoo be nel nanzheklat be gak cheey be, nel nzhekla be gak kwerp cheen be kwaan nzho naz leen yiba zee lee re kwaan yizhyo ne lux lo yalnaban naz yiba.
Nu snee mdexkwaa Dios be, nu leeka xaa nak xaa mzaa Mbi Naban yo leen lextoo be mod tub nseyn zee kayaa be re kwaan né xaa zaa xaa lo be.
Kwaanzee tubka yo gan lextoo be. Nu ne be leezha mbanaka be leen kwerp ne, nayot be yiba kwaan Xaa Nabeyy be.
Nal ngwii be lo xaa, nixa nanyunt xaa lo be.
Kwaanzee nzhaal yakla be, nel ne be, leezha laa be kwerp ne zee nya be lo Xaa Nabeyy be.
Kwaanzee tubka nkwaan be le be kwaan nyula Xaa Nabeyy be, nexa chelee be mban be o chelee be ngut be.
Nel rese be telisa zhin zaa kwent lo Jesucrist, zee kad tub be kayaa lo Dios kwaan nzhaal kayaa be, kwaan wen o kwaan nawent, modxa mle be leezha nzoka be leen xkwerp be lo yizhyo ne.
Nu nzheb nu ne nu Xaa Nabeyy, kwaanzee nseed nu stub naz xaa xomod zheb xaa ne xaa Xaa Nabeyy. Nlabeyy wen Dios re nu, nu nzhekla na noka re gu labeyy wen gu nu.
Naniit na kwaane zee le gu xgab wen re nu, sinka nii na kwaane zee nzho mod keb gu lo re xaa nto yalxwa nel nzhak xaa, per nangwiit xaa cho kwaan nzho leen lextoo xaa.
Kwaanzee chelee lak xaa nzak nachan nu, naka nel nkela nu Dios; nu chelee gu nzak gu nanachant nu, naka nel nkela nu re gu.
Lee yalnkela cheen Jesucrist nabeyy leen lextoo be, nel ne be lee xaa ngut kwent cheen rese be, nu kwaanzee naka mod rese be ngut.
Kwaanzee Jesucrist ngut kwent cheen rese be, zee rese be mban; nu nambant be zee le be kwaan nzhekla be; mban be zee le be kwaan nzhekla Jesucrist, xaa ngut nu mroban kwent cheen rese be.
Kwaanzee nanzhaalt wiira be lo re myet mod tub xaa yizhyo, nixa yilo mlu Jesucrist mod myet lo be, per nal nangwiitra be lo xaa mod tub myet.
Kwaanzee lee xaa nzo kwaan Jesucrist, nak xaa kub. Lee re kwaan gox mdedla lo xaa, lee re kwaan nal nak kwaan kub lo xaa.
Nu rese kwaane nak xchiin Dios. Nebse kwent cheen Jesucrist mle Dios zee chul kwi re be kwaan lee xaa. Nu mzaa xaa zhiin ne lo nu le nu zee rese xaa kwi chul kwaan lee xaa.
Kwaan nii na nak, lee Dios kale kwi chul re myet kwaan lee xaa kwent cheen Jesucrist, nu sbaa nanaabt xaa kwent lo re jwalt cheen re myet, nu lo nu mlaa xaa zhiin ne zee zaa nu kwent cheen re kwaane.
Kwaanzee mkayaa nu yalnabeyy zaa nu kwent cheen Jesucrist; nu naab nu zee kwi chul rese myet kwaan lee xaa, kwent cheen Jesucrist.
Dios mzhib rese jwalt cheen be tich Jesucrist, xaa namzeebt nik tub jwalt, zee mdix xaa rese jwalt cheen be, zee kwent cheen xaa nzho mod gak be nali kwenta Dios.
Lee nal, nel nkee nu xchiin Dios, naab nu lo re gu kayaa gu re kwaan nzelazh Dios, nu nakayaat guya mod tub kwaan sbaasa.
Nel lo Xkyech Dios nzhé Dios: Leezha nzho mod le na yudar lu, mroo na xjabor lu, nu mbin na xtizh lu; mbizh kwaan nle xaa gan yalnaban. [Is. 49:8] Bwii gu, nalzhe nak mbizh kwaan nroo Dios xjabor be. ¡Nalzhe nak mbizh le xaa gan yalnaban!
Nu nik tub welt zer le nu zee ralnii tub xaa lo xcheen Dios, zee snee nyent mod nii xaa nawent nak xchiin nu.
Per nela gu xomod nle nu rese kwaan mod xmos Dios, axta nyela nu nded nu re bid nu re yalzi,
nu mzaa xaaya yenn nu, mlo xaa nu lozhyib, nayii xaa ngune xaa nu, mkee doo nu zhiin, nu namlat mkaal lo nu pa mlaz nu yaal, nu mded nu bid lo yalnlaan.
Noka nlu lee nu nak xmos Dios lo re kwaan nali nle nu, lo re kwaan nzhak nu, nu mod nyela nu nded nu bid, nu mod nadoo nak nu, nlu nzho Mbi Naban cheen Dios lextoo nu, nel nkela nu wechxinn nu.
Noka nlu nak nu xmos Dios nel nii nu kwaan wli, nu nlu nkano nu yalngezh cheen Dios nseed nu re myet nu ndildiizhka nu kwaan myet.
Lak mbizh ngwii re xaa respet lo nu zlak mbizh nayii xaa ne nu, lak mbizh nzhedizh nawent xaa nu, zlak mbizh nzhedizh wen xaa nu. Mod tub xaa nkade nle xaa nu, nixa kwaan wli nii nu.
Nle xaa nu mod tub xaa nanlabeyyt xaa, nixa nlabeyy wen xaa nu. Nle xaa nu mod tub xaa ngut per seetaka mban nu; nchezi xaa nu, per nanzhuta xaa nu.
Nle xaa nales nzhak nu per tubka nix nzhak lextoo nu; nlu nu mod tub xaa prob per nle nu zee ngok rik zyen xaa; nal nik tub kwaan nankanot nu per nixa sneeya rese kwaan nkano nu.
Wech nu bzan, xaa yezh Corinto, ngunii nu duzna kwaan wli lo re gu, nu noka kwaan dub lextoo nu nkela nu re gu.
Per namlaat nu kela nu re gu per lee re gu nankelat gu re nu.
Kwaanzee, naab na lo re gu mod naab tub xaa lo xinn xaa, bkela gu nu mod nkela nu gu, modxa nzhaal kela gu.
Nyent mod yo tub xaa Jesús kwaan tub xaa nanakt xaa Jesús, kwaanzee nyent mod yo kwaan wen lo re kwaan nawent, nu nyent mod zhaal xni kwaan yalnakaw.
Nyent mod yo Jesucrist kwaan Maxuu, nu nixa nachult yo tub xaa Jesús kwaan tub xaa nanakt xaa Jesús, nel nalalt nle xaa xgab.
Nu nik tub kwaan nanakt lal lo yidoo cheen Dios nu lo yidoo cheen re maj. Nel re be nak mod yidoo cheen Dios, xaa mban. Mod né Dios: Yoo na kwaan re xaa ne, nu nzheze na kwaan re xaa ne; na gak Xdios xaa, nu lee xaa gak xaa na. [Lv. 26:12; Ez. 37:27]
Nu kwaanzee noka né Xaa Nabeyy: Broo gu lo re xaa ba, bachii gu lo xaa, nagalt gu kwaan nanzhult lo Dios, zee kayaa na re gu, [Is. 52:11]
nu na gak Xuz rese gu, nu gu gak re xgaan na nu re xchap na, snee né Xaa Nabeyy, xaa nkano gro doo yalngezh. [2 Sam. 7:14; 1 Cr. 17:13; Is. 43:6; Jer. 31:9]
Kwaanzee wech nu bzan, xaa nkedoola na, nel nguné Dios zaa Dios re kwaane lo be, zee nzhaal zo nzhul kwerp cheen be nu mbi naban cheen be lo Dios, zee tira gak be xaa Dios, nel nzheb be ne be Dios.
¡Bkela gu nu! Nik tub kwaan nawent zer le nu lo nik tub xaa, nixa zer le nu zee le tub xaa kwaan nawent, nixa zer kade nu nik tub xaa.
Nanaabt na kwent lo gu. Mod nguniila na lo gu yilo, tant nkedoola nu gu, nzhekla nu yo nu tubka kwaan re gu, nu axta listla nzo nu yet nu kwent cheen re gu.
Ne na, wen nle gu, kwaanzee nto na yalxwa cheen re gu; nixa nded nu bid nze doo gan lextoo nu, nu chul nzhak lextoo nu nselazh nu gu.
Axta gorna mzhin nu yizhyo Macedonia, nik chep zer le nu deskans, rese pa nzhin nu nted xaa nu yalzi nu tubka nchaal dil xaa nu re pa nded nu, nu tubka nzheb nu.
Per Dios, xaa nzaa balor lextoo re myet, xaa nyent balor lextoo, mle zee ngu balor lextoo re nu gorna mzhin Tito lo re nu.
Kwaanzee chul doo ngok lextoo nu mwii nu lo xaa, nu noka chul doo ngok lextoo nu nel chul doo nzhak lextoo Tito nel mseleyy gu xaa. Noka lee xaa mzaa kwent lo nu, lee re gu nzhekla doo ne lo na, nu né xaa xomod nales nzhak lextoo gu nu nle gu xgab na, kwaane mas chul mle lextoo na.
Nixa lee yech kwaan mkee na lo re gu yilo mle nales lextoo gu, nyent cho nzhak lextoo na. Ngok nales lextoo na gorna ne na lee yech zee mle nales lextoo gu lak mbizh;
per nal chul nzhak lextoo na mkee na yech zee. Nu nanzhak chult lextoo na nel mle nalesa lextoo gu, chul nzhak lextoo na nel mle nales yech lextoo gu, zee mlaa gu kwaan nawent kwaan mle gu. Leezha mleya nales doo lextoo re gu tub mod nyula Dios, nu snee lee nu namlet nik tub kwaan nawent lo re gu.
Nel leezha ngok nales lextoo tub xaa mod nyula Dios, zee le xaa gan yalnaban, nu nik tub kwaan nankint le xaa xgab. Per lee yalnales lo yizhyo ne nle zee nya xaa lo yalgut.
Nyula Dios mod ngok nales lextoo gu. ¡Zyen doo kwaan gro mleya leen lextoo gu! Nel mbin gu kwaan mkee na lo gu yilo zee myaan gu mted gu bid xaa mle kwaan nawent, nel nayii gu ne gu kwaan nawent kwaan mle xaa nu mzheb gu ne gu yalnayii cheen Dios; kwaanzee nal nzhekla gu le gu re kwaan nali. Nu kwaane nlu lee re gu nalalt nzhedizh kwaan lee xaa, xaa sbaa mle kwaan nawent.
Nu nii na, gorna mkee na yech zee, namkeet naya lo xaa mle kwaan nawent, nu nixa lo xaa mded bid lo kwaan nawent kwaan mle xaa; sinka lo re gu mkee naya zee luu Dios xomod nzhaal gon gu xtizh nu.
Nu kwaane mseleyy doo nu. Kwaanzee chul nzhak lextoo nu, nu mas chul ngok lextoo nu leezha mbin nu mle gu ngoknix lextoo Tito, nu nal nanlet xaa xgab re gu.
Nu namlet gu zee roo xkalnto na, nel nzhé na lo Tito chul nto na yalxwa cheen re gu. Nu snee wli rese kwaan mlu nu lo re gu, sbaaka wli kwaan nzhé nu lo Tito.
Nu lee Tito mas nkela gu gorna nselazh Tito xomod mbin gu xtizh nu, nu xomod chul mkayaa gu xaa kwaan dub lextoo gu nu kwaan yalnacheb.
¡Nu chul doo nzhak lextoo na, nel ne na lee re gu nle re kwaan nzhaal le gu!
Lee nal wech nu bzan, nzhekla nu ne gu xomod mkee Dios zhiin lextoo re xaa Jesús, xaa yizhyo Macedonia.
Nu nixa zyen bid kwaan nagan mded xaa, chul doo nzhak lextoo re xaa; nu nixa prob xaa, mod tub xaa rik mzaa xaa gon.
Nu nzho mod za na kwent lee xaa mzaa gon kwaan dub lextoo xaa, nu mzaa xaa re kwaan nzho mod zaa xaa nu axta kwaan nagan zaa xaa, mzaa xaa.
Nu mnaab xaa lo re nu zee nzho mod le xaa yudar re xaa mle nambey Jesús, xaa prob.
Nu mzaa xaa axta paro namlet nu xgab, yilotlaka mzaa xaa leeka lee xaa lo Xaa Nabeyy, mod tub gon kwaan dub gan cheen xaa, sbaa mle xaa yudar nu lo xchiin nu, noka kwaane nak mod tub gon, nu mlela xaaya modxa nzhekla Dios.
Kwaanzee ngunaab nu lo Tito, zee naab xaa gon kwaan mzelo re gu ntop gu nzhala lak mbee.
Re gu nak xaa masra kwaan nle: mod ngwiira gu lo Jesús, mod nzhedizhra gu stub naz diizh kwaan nagakt gu, nu mod nzhakra gu, nu nzhora mas gan lextoo gu kee gu xchiin Dios. Kwaanzee nzhaal zaara gu gon, kwaane nak tub kwaan wen le gu.
Nu nanabeyyt na gu zaa gu gon ne, nebse nzhekla na ne na che wlipa nak yalnkela cheen gu, zee mlaa na luu gu yalnkela cheen gu lo re xaa Jesús, xaa yizhyo Macedonia.
Nel nela re gu lee Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be, kwaan yalnkela cheen xaa, ngok xaa tub xaa prob, nixa rik doo nak xaa, zee kwaan yalprob cheen xaa, gak rik re be.
Kwaanzee snee nii na lo gu. Nzha tub liin lee re gu mzelo mzaa gon; nu kwaan dub lextoo gu mzelo gu mzaa guya, kwaanzee nal nzhaal yilo top guya.
Nel mzelola gu mtop guya kwaan dub lextoo gu, gulo btop guya.
Nel chelee tub xaa nzhekla zaa gon, Dios nkayaa kwaan nzho mod zaa xaa. Dios nanaabt tub kwaan nankanot xaa.
Nu nanzheklat na zaa gu gon, zee yo jwalt kwaan lo re gu zee lee stub gu nkano zyen kwaan;
kwaan nzhekla na nak lal kwaan kano re be. Lee nal lee re gu nkano kwaan nankanot re xaa ba, per stub welt lee xaa kano kwaan nankanot gu, nu snee lal yo re gu.
Modxa nkee lo Xkyech Dios: “Xaa mtop zyena namlaketraya lo xaa, nu lee xaa mtop chepse nangujwaltraya lo xaa”. [Ex. 16:18]
Dixkix Dios nel noka Tito nkela xaa re gu kwenta na.
Nel mzeyal xaa le xaa zhiin ne, nel tant nle doo xaa xgab re gu, nal nzhekla xaa yaadsewii xaa lo re gu stuba.
Nu kwaan Tito xaal na stub wech, xaa nii re xaa Jesús wen nak.
Nu leeka re xaa Jesús mleey xaa, zee ya xaa kwaan re nu le xaa yudar nu yilaa nu gon ne lo re stub naz xaa Jesús, zee ne rese xaa zee wlipa nkela be xaa, zee chul luu Xaa Nabeyy.
Snee nzhekla nu le nu, zee nyent mod gaazh xaa kwaan tich nu lo zyen doo gon kwaan katop gu.
Kwaanzee tubka nkwaan nu le nu re kwaan nali, nu nanebt delant lo Dios noka delant lo re myet.
Nu kwaan re xaa ne, xaal nu stub wech, tub xaa mlu nali doo nak xaa lo rese kwaan; nu nal nzho gan lextoo xaa yiid xaa lo gu, nel ne xaa xomod nak re gu.
Nu chelee tub xaa nabdizh lo re gu, cho nak Tito, yé gu lo re xaa, lee xaa nak tub xmig na nu tubka nkee rop nu zhiin, zee nle nu yudar re gu. Nu chelee xaa nabdizh xaa cho nak rop wech ne, xaa nzha kwaan Tito, guzh gu lo xaa, lee xaa nak tub xaa mxaal re xaa Jesús, zee gool re myet lo Jesucrist.
Nu kwaanzee blu gu yalnkela cheen gu lo re xaa Jesús, zee ne xaa wli nak mod mto nu yalxwa cheen gu lo xaa; snee luu yalnkela cheen gu lo re xaa ne.
Lee gon kwaan xaal be lo re xaa mle nambey Jesús, xaa prob, nankintra nii na lo re gu xomod nzhaal top guya,
nel ne wen na lee gu topa. Nel tubka nto na yalxwa cheen gu lo re xaa Jesús, xaa yizhyo Macedonia, nel kwaan dub lextoo gu ntop guya. Axta dub liin zee, lee re gu xaa yizhyo Acaya, nzhekla gu zaa gu gon ne. Zee snee ngune re xaa Macedonia kwaane, zee noka re xaa mzelo ntop gon.
Nu xaal na Tito kwaan xchop wech ne, zee zo list gu kwaan re gon mod mza na kwent lo re xaa Macedonia,
napa lee lak wech, xaa Macedonia, ya kwaan na lo re gu nu yiid nu lo gu. Nu chelee gu nalist nkano gu gon cheen gu, zee ton nu ne nu gu, zee noka re gu ton wii leeka lo re gu.
Kwaanzee ngunaab na lo yon wech ne zee yilo yasewii xaa lo re gu, le xaa yudar gu top gu gon, kwaan né gu zaa gu. Kwaanzee nzhaal listla nzho gon cheen gu gorna zhin nu, zee naka tub gon kwaan zaa gu kwaan dub lextoo gu, nu nanakta tub gon kwaan zaa gu kwaan lajwers.
Bselazh gu kwaane: “Xaa kwaan nanzhaant gro, chepse yalgon ntop xaa; nu xaa kwaan gro nzhaan, zyen yalgon ntop xaa”.
Kad tub gu nzhaal zaa kwaan mlela gu xgab zaa gu, nu nazaat guya lajwers, nel Dios nkela xaa kwaan nzaaya kwaan dub lextoo.
Dios nzho mod zelazh zyen doo kwaan lo re be, zee tubka kano be kwaan nkin be, nu axta lakeya le be yudar re xaa prob.
Nel lee xtizh Dios nzhé: Zyen kwaan mzaa Dios lo re xaa prob, nel tubka nali nak xaa. [Sal. 112:9]
Dios nak xaa nzaa ben kwaan nxeen myet, noka nzaa xaa kwaan nzhaw myet. Lee xaa nzaa lo re be rese ben kwaan nkin be ko be lo yo, nu lee xaa le zee chul rooya, zee masra gon nzho mod zaa be.
Nu nii na, kano be reta lo kwaan, zee nzho mod zaa gu zyen kwaan, kwaan dub lextoo gu. Nu lee gon kwaan xaal gu kwaan nu, le zee zyen xaa zaa dixkix lo Dios.
Nel gorna zaa nuya lo re xaa mle nambey Jesús, nanebt zaa guya lo xaa nel nkin xaaya, noka leeya le zee zaa xaa dixkix lo Dios.
Zee lee re xaa gool lo Dios, nel gon ne luu lo re xaa lee re gu wlipa nzhon wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist. Nu snee noka re xaa zaa dixkix lo Dios mod nzaa re guya kwaan dub lextoo gu, kwent cheen xaa nu kwent cheen rese xaa.
Zee noka kela xaa gu nu naab xaa lo Dios kwaan dub lextoo xaa zee chul yo gu, nel lee yalnkela cheen Dios, kwaan gro doo nak, nlu leen lextoo gu.
¡Dixkix Dios nel mzelazh xaa tub kwaan gro doo lo re be, kwaan nyent mod zaa be kwent kwaan wdizh!
Lak xaa mbezh leezha nzo na lo re gu, nzheb doo na nii na, nixa nakap doo nkee na lo yech leezha nzo na zit lo re gu. Kwaanzee ngunaab na kwaane lo re gu kwaan yalnadoo nu kwaan yalnkela cheen Jesucrist.
Gorna yal na yasewii na lo re gu, nalet gu re kwaan nanzhaalt le gu, zee nakint yii na lo gu. Talbes nkin nii na nakap lo re xaa mbezh, lee nu nzhedizh kwenta myet yizhyo ne; nu list nzo na zhaal na kwaan re xaa snee mbezh.
Wli lee re be nzhi lo yizhyo ne, per nandilt be mod ndil xaa yizhyo ne.
Nadilt be kwaan re yiib yizhyo ne, sinka kwaan yalngezh cheen Dios ndil be, zee nzho mod lux be re pa nzho yalngezh cheen Maxuu,
nu snee nlux be rese xgab yiya nu rese yalnto kwaan nle zee nalabeyyt xaa Dios. Kwaanzee ndil be kwaan rese xgab yizhyo ne zee luux rese xgab kwaan nanakt cheen Jesucrist.
Gorna yilo gon gu xtizh nu, zee listla nzo nu ted nu rese xaa kwaan nanzaat yek gon xtizh Jesucrist bid.
Gwii gu xomod naka. Chelee tub xaa nzak nak xaa tub xaa Jesucrist, nzhaal ne xaa, noka re nu nak xaa Jesucrist.
Nu chol nto na yalxwa lo yalnabeyy kwaan mkayaa nu lo Jesucrist, nantont na, nel Xaa Nabeyy mzaa yalnabeyy ne lo na, zee le na zee nye zo gu lo xaa, nu tira nalet na tub kwaan nawent lo gu.
Nanzhaalt le gu xgab nzhekla na cheb na re gu kwaan re yech kwaan nkee na.
Nzho lak xaa nii lee yech kwaan mkee na nakap doo nii, per leezha nzo na lo gu nak na tub xaa nadoo nu nadoo nii na.
Per xaa kwaan nii kwaane, nzhaal ne xaa xomod nkee nu lo yech leezha nzo nu zit lo re gu, sbaaka le nu re kwaane gorna zo nu kwaan re gu.
Nankwaant nu wii nu xomod nzhak stub naz re xaa, xaa nto doo yalxwa, nel leezha nzhekla xaa wii xaa xomod nzhak wechxinn xaa, nle xaa tub kwaan nachan.
Per lee re nu nantot nu yalxwa tub mod nanzhaalt to nuya. Lee nu nzhaal to yalxwa mod mxaal Dios nu lo re gu.
Kwaanzee nanlet nu tub kwaan nanzhaalt le nu leezha nto nu yalxwa cheen re gu, nel re nu nak xaa mzaa wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist lo re gu yilotlaka.
Nu nantot nu yalxwa lo xchiin stub naz xaa. Lee re nu nzhekla kee zhiin lo re gu, zee mas wii gu lo Jesucrist nu zee mas roo xchiin nu lo re gu.
Nu sbaaka nzhekla nu cheech nu wdizh chul re yezh kwaan nzhi mas zit lazh gu. Per tira nantot nu yalxwa lo tub kwaan nanakt xchiin nu, kwaan mle stub xaa.
Chelee tub be nzhekla to yalxwa, to be yalxwa lo xcheen Xaa Nabeyy.
Leezha lee tub xaa nto yalxwa cheen leeka lee xaa nu xomod chul nle xaa, nanonta. Per leezha nto Xaa Nabeyy yalxwa cheen tub xaa, zeesi nona.
Nachan snee nii na, per nzhaal nii naya, kwaanzee naab na zee yela gu gon guya.
Nzhak selos na kwent cheen re gu, nu yalselos ne nyaad naz lo Dios. Nel naka mod mza na gu zee chelya gu kwaan sa be, xaa nak Jesucrist; nu nzhekla na za na gu lo xaa mod tub ngwnaa me zer chaal xaabyi.
Per nzheb na, napa lee Maxuu kakade gu kwaan yalnzhak cheen xaa, modxa mkade xaa Ev, napa sbaaka kakade xaa re gu, zee laa gu mod nkela gu Jesucrist nu mod ngwii gu lo xaa.
Kwaanzee mkayaa re gu rese xaa nzhin lo gu, xaa nawlit nzaa kwent cheen Jesús, kwaan namzaat nu kwent lo gu. Nu kwaan dub lextoo gu mkayaa gu kwent nawlit cheen Mbi Naban, zee mkayaa gu stub wdizh kwaan nawlit, kwaan nzak gu nyaadno yalnaban. Tira nanagant mkayaa gu re kwaane.
Per ne na lal non na kwaan re xaa nreke gu tich, xaa nzak gu mkayaa grora yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist.
Nixa nagakt na wdizh wen na, per nlabeyy na xcheen Dios, nu kwaane tubka mlu nu lo re gu, lo re kwaan mle nu.
¿Cho kwaan nzak gu? ¿Che nawent mle na, mza na kwent cheen wdizh chul lo re gu, nu nangunaabt na nik tub kwaan lo re gu? ¿Che nzak gu, na nak tub xaa nanont nel mza na kwent cheen wdizh chul ne lo gu, nu nangunaabt na kix gu ka na?
Kwaane nak mod mkiib na demi lo re stub naz xaa Jesús, xaa mzaa demi lo na zee za na kwent lo re gu.
Nu leezha mkin na tub kwaan leezha mzo na lo re gu, nangunaabt na nik tub kwaan lo gu, zee nangakt na storb lo re gu. Nel lee re wech, xaa mroo naz yizhyo Macedonia, mzaa kwaan nkin na. Zee mle naya axta paro nzho moda lo na, zee nangakt na storb lo re gu, nu sbaaka le naya dubse nal.
Wlipa na ne Jesucrist. Nyakdoola na lee wdizh ne nzhazhin re yezh cheen Acaya, nu nalet na nik tub kwaan zee saaw na loya.
¿Chozhiin snee nzhedizh na? ¿Che nzak gu naka nel nankelat na re gu? ¡Dios ne, nkela na re gu!
Per seetaka le na kwaan kale na nal, zee nazat na lugar lo re xaa nzhekla to yalxwa lo mod nkee xaa xchiin Dios. Snee nyent mod yé xaa lal nkee rop nu xchiin Dios.
Rese xaa ba nawlit nak xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, nebse nkade xaa, nu nle xaa mod tub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist.
Nu nanakt kwaane tub kwaan zer ded, che nanet gu leeka mer Maxuu nle mod tub mandad cheen Dios, xaa nzo lo xni;
kwaanzee lee re xmos xaa nzho mod le kwenta tub xaa nkee zhiin lo re kwaan nali. ¡Per xaa ne telisa kix Dios re kwaan nle xaa!
Bare na nii na lo gu stub welt, nanzhak nachant na; per chelee gu sbaa nle gu xgab, laa gu nii na lo gu kwenta tub xaa nzhak nachan yek, zee noka na nzho mod to chep yalxwa.
Leezha nto na yalxwa ne, naniit na mod tub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Xaa Nabeyy; mod tub xaa nachan nzhedizh na.
¡Nel tant zyen xaa nto yalxwa mod xaa yizhyo ne zee noka na to chep yalxwa!
Nel nix doo nzhak lextoo re gu nkayaa gu xaa nzhak nachan. Nu nzak gu nzhak gu,
per axta nyela gu nixa nawent nle xaa lo gu: nle xaa gu xmos xaa, noka nkiib xaa re kwaan lo gu, noka nkade xaa gu, noka nto xaa yalxwa cheen gu, nu axta ngazya re xaa tagarlo gu.
¿Cho kwaan nzak gu? ¿Che nzhaal ton na nel nadoo nak na, tira namlet na sbaa lo gu? Nu chelee xaa zee nto yalxwa noka na toya (nixa kwaan nachan nak kwaane).
¿Che xaa dii Israel nak xaa ba? Seeka na. ¿Che nak xaa ba dii cheen Abraham? Noka na.
¿Che nak xaa ba xaa nkee xchiin Jesucrist? Na mas nkee zhiin ke re xaa ba. (Leezha nii na kwaane, nii na mod nii tub xaa nzhak nachan yek.) Na nzhakee mas zhiin ke re xaa ba, nu nzhego xaa na lozhyib mas zyenra welt ke re xaa ba, mas zyenra welt nzhezaa xaaya yenn na kwaan bins, mas zyenra welt mer nget na kwent cheen Jesucrist.
Tub gaay welt mzaa bins re sawlazh na na, nu galbchiibyeega yaa bins mla xaa tich na kad welt.
Chon welt mzaayag xaa na, nu noka mzaake xaa na. Chon welt mer nglaw na leen nistoo leezha mlux bark, nu mer ngep na nis, nu tub welt axta tub yaal nu tub mbizh mdeed na bid leen nistoo.
Leezha nzha na re yezh: zyen doo welt mer nglaw na leen yuu, zyen doo welt mlewann xaa na, zyen doo welt mrenal re sawlazh na na, nu noka re xaa nanakt xaa sawlazh na. Nu noka mdeed na bid re yezh, nu naz wen, nu leen nistoo, nu lo re xaa nawlit nak xaa Jesús.
Zyen doo zhiin kwaan nagan nzhale na, zyen doo welt nangota na, nzhadeed na yalnlaan, yizhnzhek, zyen doo welt nanzhawt na, ndeed na bid lo nal, nyent ler gak na.
Nu lo re kwaane nzhora mas kwaan, yizata mbizh mas nle na xgab che wen nzha re xaa Jesús.
Chelee tub xaa ne nzak, noka na ne nzak; nu cheleeya nralnii tub xaa lo xcheen Dios, tira nawent nzhak lextoo na.
Nu chelee na to na yalxwa lo tub kwaan, to naya leezha nangezht na nel lee yalngezh cheen Dios nzo kwaan na.
Dios, xaa nak Xuz Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be, xaa nzhaal gool re xaa lo yizata mbizh, ne xaa lee na nii kwaan wli.
Leezha mzo na yezh Damasco, lee tub xaa nak zhiin, xaa nkee zhiin lo rey Aretas, mxaal xaa re soldad zee zen xaa na,
per ngu lak xaa mla na kwaan chekwid naz bentant, kwaan nkee naz jwer roo yezh, nu snee mle na gan mxoon na lo re xaa.
Nik tub gan nalet na to na yalxwa cheenka na, per nzhaal nii na lo re gu re kwaan mlu Dios lo na nu re kwaan mkayaa na lo Xaa Nabeyy.
Nzhala tub chida liin mbe Dios na naz yiba. Nu nanet na, che mbi naban cheen na ngwa o noka kwerp cheen na, nebse Dios neya.
Per ne na nixa kwaan mbi naban cheen na o kwaan xkwerp na,
ngwa na Lach Chul Doo cheen Dios. Naz ba mbin na wdizh kwaan nik tub myet nyent mod nii, nu nanzheklat Dios nii naya.
Nzho mod to na yalxwa lo kwaane, per nyent mod to na leeka yalxwa cheen na. Nebse nii na, nak na mod tub xaa nangezht.
Chelee na nzhekla na to na yalxwa, nanakta tub kwaan nachan, nel kwaan wli kanii na. Per nalet naya zee nik tub xaa nalet xgab lee na nak mas xwara lo mod nle na o re kwaan nii na.
Zee natot na yalxwa lo rese kwaan mlu Dios lo na, nel cho kwerp cheen na mzob xaa tub kwaan mod tub yich, kwaan nteed na bid, kwaane nak mod tub mandad cheen Maxuu.
Chon welt ngunaab na lo Xaa Nabeyy zee kiib xaa kwaan nak mod yich ne cho na,
per lee Xaa Nabeyy né lo na: “Nebse yalnkela cheen na nkin lu, kwaan nlu na lo lu, nel lee yalgezh cheen na mas nlu lo re xaa nangezht”. Nu kwaanzee nto na yalxwa nel nangezht na, Dios nle yudar na, zee kwent cheen na luu yalngezh cheen Jesucrist.
Nu nyakla na leezha nangezht na, leezha nge re xaa lo na, nu leezha nkin na kwaan, nu leezha nrenal xaa na, nu leezha ndeed na bid kwent cheen Jesucrist; nel leezha mas nangezht na mas nlu nzo yalngezh cheen Dios kwaan na.
Mle na mod tub xaa nachan leezha mto na yalxwa lo gu, nel sbaa nzhekla gu le xaa lo gu, per kwaan wlipa nak nzhaal to gu yalxwa cheen na. Nel na nak tub xaa mas nanont ke re xaa kwaan mbezh mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, xaa nzak gu non doo; nixa na nak tub xaa tira nanont.
Nel leezha mzo na kwaan re gu mle na zyen kwaan gro, zee ne gu wlipa mkayaa na yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist. Myedoola na mle na re kwaan gro nu kwaan chul lo re gu.
Kwaan mle na lo re gu lal mle naya lo re stub naz xaa Jesús. Tubka kwaan nalalt mle na lo re gu, nanaabt na nik tub kwaan lo re gu. ¿Cho kwaan nzak gu? ¿Che nzhaal naab na perdon lo gu kwent cheen kwaane?
Nu nal listla na yal na lo re gu stub welt, zee gak chon welt yal na lo re gu, nu nixa welt ne nanaabt na nik tub kwaan lo re gu. Nanzheklat na ka na kwaan nkano re gu, lee na nzhekla nyera zo gu lo Dios. Mod xiin na nzak na gu. Nu lee xinn xaa nanzhaalt kwaan demi zaa lo xuz xaa, sinka xuz xaa nzhaal kwaan demi zaa xaa lo xinn xaa.
Kwaanzee lee na, kwaan dub lextoo na, lux na rese kwaan nkano na, zee chul yo re gu. Nixa sneeya, nzak na leezha mas nkela na re gu, lee re gu mas nanketla na.
Nixa namkiibt na demi lo re gu leezha mbal na lo re gu; per seesa nzho gu mbezh, lee na mle zee mla gu lo tramp.
¿Che wliya? Lo Tito nu lo stub wech ngunaab na zee yasewii xaa lo re gu. ¿Che mkade Tito gu? ¿O che nawlit lal nak rop nu lo re gu, leezha lal mle rop nu Tito xgab?
<range>
Tant nkedoola na gu. ¿Cho xgab nle gu? ¿Che nzak gu nzhekla nu gak nonra nu lo gu? Lee rop nu kanii delant lo Dios nel xaa Jesús nak nu, zee nyera zo gu lo Dios.
Nel nzak na gorna yal na lo re gu, napa nkin le na mod nanzheklat gu, nel nanzhit gu mod nzhekla na. Nzak na napa kadildiizh gu, napa kayak selos gu, napa kayii re gu, napa kayak gu meskin, napa nawent kanii gu tub gu stub gu, napa kayak gu tub xaa nkwaan diizh, napa kato gu yalxwa, napa karexcho re gu.
Noka nzak na napaka nton na ne na re gu gorna yal na lo re gu stub welt, gonn na nel nzha doo mbizh lee lak gu kale kwaan nawent. Nu seesa nzho lak gu zer laa re kwaan nawent kwaan kale: nchaal gu stub ngwnaa, nu nle gu re kwaan nawent kwaan nzhekla kwerp cheen gu. Zee ton na ne na Dios mod kale gu.
Welt ne gak yon welt yal na lo re gu. Leezha ngaazh be tub kwaan tich stub xaa Jesús, nzhaal yo chop o chon testig.
Ngulola mgalno na re xaa mle jwalt yilo lo rese gu, nu nal nixa zit nzo na, noka nzho mod galno na re xaa, mod mle naya leezha mbal na mrop welt lo re gu. Nal chelee na yal na lo re gu stub welt nalest la na ne na re xaa nle kwaan nawent,
nel lee re gu kakwaan tub kwaan luu wlipa lee Jesucrist nii kwaan na. Nu Jesucrist nanakt tub xaa nangezht lo re gu, lee xaa nlu yalngezh cheen xaa lo re gu.
Wli lee xaa mkee lo krus mod tub xaa nangezht, per nal mban xaa kwaan yalngezh cheen Dios. Nu leeka snee, lee re nu nak mod tub xaa nangezht kwenta lee xaa, per tubka yo nu kwaan lee xaa, kwent cheen yalngezh cheen Dios, zee le nu yudar re gu.
Nu bwii gu ne xomod nak gu, zee ne gu nen che wli nayiyot gu lo xcheen Jesucrist. ¿Che nanet gu lee Jesucrist mban leen lextoo be? ¡Per nambant xaa leen lextoo re gu chelee gu yiyo gu ngwii gu lo xaa!
Nu ne na, lee re gu ne, lee re nu nayiyot lo xcheen Jesucrist.
Nu naab nu lo Dios zee nalet gu kwaan nawent, nel nu nzhekla zee nzho mod le gu kwaan wen, nixa nzak gu tira nguyo nu lo re kwaane.
Nel nyent mod wdizh nu kwaan nawlit, nebse re kwaan wli nzhekla nu nzhedizh nu.
Kwaanzee nyakla nu leezha nangezht nu, nu lee re gu ngezh, zee seetaka naab nu lo Dios zee lee re gu nalira zo lo Dios.
Yilo yech ne kakee na lo gu gorna zeeraka yal na lo re gu, zee nagakt na tub xaa nakap doo lo gu kwaan yalnabeyy kwaan mzaa Xaa Nabeyy lo na, gorna zhin na lo gu. Lee yalnabeyy cheen na nanakt tub kwaan lux na gu, leeya nak tub kwaan le zee zo nyera gu lo Dios.
Wech nu bzan, ngulola ngunii na rese kwaane. Nzhekla na yo gu chul nu bkwaan gu re kwaan le zee nali zo gu lo Dios, nu byaan gu le gu kwaan wen, zee chul kwi re gu, zee lee Dios xaa nkela be, zo kwaan re gu.
Guzh gu “dix” lo re wech nu lo re bzan, nu daw gu tub bit tagarlo xaa tub mod nali.
Nu rese xaa mle nambey Jesús, xaa nzhi nee, nxaal “dix” lo re gu.
Na nak Pab, nu nak na tub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, nu nanakt na tub xaa mxaal o mleey myet yizhyo. Na nak tub xaa mleey mer Jesucrist nu Dios, xaa nak Xuz be, xaa mseban Jesucrist.
Na, nu rese wech xaa nzo kwaan na nee, kakee na yech ne lo re gu, xaa nak xaa Jesucrist, xaa nzho re yezh cheen Galacia.
Nzhekla na lee Dios, xaa nak Xuz be, nu Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be, luu xaa yalnkela cheen xaa lo re gu, le xaa zee kwi chul re gu.
Nu leeka Jesucrist mzaa Jesucrist ngut kwent cheen re jwalt cheen rese be, zee koo xaa be lo re kwaan naxinn lo yizhyo ne, re mbizh kwaan nzho be nal, mod nzhekla Dios, xaa nak Xuz be.
¡Nzhekla na gool rese xaa lo Dios rese mbizh! ¡Sbaa gaka!
Mdedyall doo na gorna ne na lee re gu mbin stub wdizh kwaan nzak gu nzaa yalnaban, ta mlaa gu Dios, xaa mrezh gu kwaan yalnkela cheen Jesucrist, nu mkayaa guya.
Per kwaan wli nak, nyentra stub wdizh chul kwaan nyaadno yalnaban. Nal nzho lak xaa nzhekla le yek gu chop nu nzhekla xaa chee xaa wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist.
Per chelee tub re nu o tub mandad cheen Dios zaa kwent cheen stub wdizh chul lo gu, la yalnayii cheen Dios tich xaa zee, nu xobde Dios xaa.
Nu kwaan ngunii nu yilo bare na nii naya lo gu stub welt: Chelee tub xaa zaa kwent stub wdizh chul lo gu, nu nanakta kwaan mzaa nu lo gu, la yalnayii cheen Dios tich xaa zee, nu xobde Dios xaa.
Nankwaant na nix gak lextoo re myet ne na, lee na nkwaan gak nix lextoo Dios ne na. ¡Nu chelee na nkwaan na yula re myet na, zee nanaktra na tub mos cheen Jesucrist!
Wech nu bzan, nzhekla na ne re gu kwaane: Lee wdizh chul kwaan nza na kwent, nanakta tub xgab cheen myet.
Namkayaat naya, nu nixa namseedt naya lo myet, leeya nak tub kwaan mseed Jesucrist na.
Nu nzak na ne re gu, lee yilo leezha mreke na tich rese kwaan nak cheen sawlazh na, nu mrenal na re xaa Jesucrist, nu tubka mle na xgab lux na xaa.
Nu lo re kwaan mlu xey nu, na ngok tub xaa mas mle rese kwaan né xaa; lo re xaa kwaan nzexen kwaan na, na ngok tub xaa nzheklara ngozhaw rese kwaan mle re xey nu, xaa yilo.
Per Dios mleey na leezha zeeraka gal na, nu kwaan yalnkela cheen xaa mrezh xaa na. Nu leezha mzhib gan lextoo xaa,
mle xaa mlabeyy na Xgann xaa, zee za na kwent cheen xaa kwaan nyalno yalnaban lo re xaa nanakt xaa Israel. Nu namnabdizht na lo stub xaa zaa kwent cheen wdizh chul lo na;
nu nixa nangwanabdizht na lo re xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist yilo ke na, xaa nzho Jerusalén. Kwaan mle na nak, ta ngwa na yizhyo cheen Arabia, nu zeera mbare na naz yezh Damasco.
Chon liin gwluzh zeera ngwa na Jerusalén, zee mlabeyy na Pér, nu lo xaa mlaz na chiin mbizh.
Per nik stub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist nangunet na lo, nebse lo Chag, wech Xaa Nabeyy.
Nu delant lo Dios nii na wli na kwaan kakee na lo gu.
Gwluzh zeera ngwa na naz yizhyo cheen Siria nu Cilicia.
Kwaanzee lee re xaa Jesús, xaa nzho yizhyo cheen Judea nanlabeyyt xaa na.
Nebse kwaan nzhayon re xaa ne nak: “Lee xaa kwaan mrenal be yilo, lee nal nzaa xaa kwent cheen wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist, leeka kwaan nzhekla xaa luux yilo”.
Nu nal nzholl re xaa lo Dios, nel mchee Dios mod nak na.
Stub chida liin gwluzh leezha mlu xni lo na, zee ngwa na Jerusalén stuba kwaan Bernabé, nu mbe nu Tito.
Ngwa nu nel mlu Dios lo na nzhaal ya na. Nu gorna nzola na Jerusalén, nguu na tub junt kwaan re xaa nabeyy lo xaa Jesús, techo re nu, nu mza na kwent lo re xaa, kwent cheen wdizh chul kwaan nza na lo re xaa nanakt xaa Israel. Nu mle na kwaane nel nanzheklat na lee kwaan mlu na, nu re kwaan kale na, luux.
Per nixa Tito, xaa nzo kwaan na, namlet re xaa nabeyy jwers lo xaa yo xaa beyy cheen re nu, xaa Israel, nixa nanzhot xaa beyy cheen re nu, xaa Israel.
Per lak xaa nkade, nu nle mod xaa Jesús, xlaan mrep xaa lo re be, nze selach xaa nen cho kwaan nzho mod le be, nel msela Jesucrist be; nu zee mkwaan xaa mod le xaa zee kozhaw be kwaan nzhé re xey nu, zee gak be mod tub mos cheen re kwaan nzhé xey nu.
Per tira namzaat re nu yek nu gon xtizh xaa nel nanzheklat nu lee re gu laa wdizh chul, kwaan nak kwaan wli.
Per lee re xaa nak xaa nabeyy be, nik tub rason namzaatra xaa lo na. (Nu lo na nanont cho kwaan ngok xaa yilo, nel rese xaa lal nak lo Dios.)
Per ngune xaa lee Dios mleey na za na kwent cheen wdizh chul lo re xaa nanakt xaa Israel, modxa mkayaa Pér zaa xaa kwent ne lo re sawlazh nu.
Nu leeka Dios, xaa mle yudar Pér zaa Pér kwent lo re sawlazh nu, nel nak xaa tub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, leeka Dios zee, nle yudar na za na kwent lo re xaa nanakt xaa Israel, nel na nak tub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist.
Nu kwaanzee lee Chag, Pér nu Juan, re xaa non lo re xaa Jesús, mzeen xaa lee Dios mleey na kee na zhiin ne lo yalnkela cheen Dios. Nu snee mlu xaa mkayaa xaa nu mod xmig xaa, nel mzaa xaa yaa xaa lo rop nu Bernabé, nu mzeyal xaa ya nu lo re xaa nanakt xaa Israel kee nu zhiin, nu lee re xaa kee zhiin lo re sawlazh nu.
Nebse ngunaab re xaa lo nu selazh nu re xaa prob, mer kwaan nzhekla doo na le na.
Per gorna mzhin Pér yezh Antioquía, mgalno na xaa delant lo rese xaa, nel lee xaa kale tub kwaan tira nawent.
Nel gorna mzhin xaa mzelo xaa nzhaw xaa kwaan re xaa Jesús, xaa nanakt xaa Israel. Per gorna mzhin lak xaa mxaal Chag, xaa sawlazh nu, nanzheklatra xaa gaw xaa kwaan re xaa Jesús, xaa nanakt xaa Israel; nu mlaa xaa xaa, nel mzheb xaa ne xaa re xaa kwaan mbezh nzhaal yo rese xaa Jesús beyy cheen nu.
Nu mzhaal lak sawlazh na kwaan Pér lo kwaan kale xaa, nu axta noka Bernabé mkade xaa, mzhaal kwaan re xaa, xaa kwaan mbezh le tub kwaan nu nle stub kwaan.
Kwaanzee gorna ngune na nanzhat xaa nali mod nii wdizh chul, zee nzhé na lo Pér delant lo rese xaa: “Lu nak xaa Israel, nu nle lu mod tub xaa nanakt xaa Israel. ¿Chozhiin nabeyy lu lee re xaa nanakt xaa Israel yo mod rop be?
¿Che nzak lu, lee re be, xaa nak xaa Israel axta leezha ngol be, xwara ke re xaa nanakt xaa Israel, xaa nzeb jwalt?
Per noka ne be, nakayaat Dios nik tub xaa mod xaa nali lo Dios nel ngozhaw xaa ley cheen Ches; Dios kayaa xaa mod xaa nali nel ngwii xaa lo Jesucrist. Kwaanzee noka be ngwii lo Jesucrist, zee kayaa Dios be. Nu nanakta nel ngozhaw be ley cheen Ches, nel nik tub xaa nakayaat Dios nel ngozhaw xaa ley cheen Ches.
Nu kwaanzee, chelee be nzhekla be kayaa Dios be mod xaa nali nel ngwii be lo Jesucrist, zee lee lak xaa yé, nzeb be jwalt nel nangwiit be lo re kwaan nzhé re xey be. ¡Chol sbaa naka, Jesucrist nle zee zeeb be jwalt, nawlit kwaane!”
Ngulo mlux na re kwaan nzhé re xey nu, nu chol bare na dexkwaa naya stub welt, leeka na ngak xaa nzeb jwalt.
Nel lee lo ley nu lo kwent cheen ley, mod tub xaa ngut nak na, zee ban na mod nzhekla Dios.
Tubka kwaan Jesucrist mkee na lo krus, nu nanakt na xaa mban, xaa mban nak Jesucrist, xaa kwaan nzho leen lextoo na nal. Nu lee yalnaban kwaan mban na leen xkwerp na nal, mban naya nel ngwii na lo Xgann Dios, xaa nkedoola na, nu ngut kwent cheen na.
Chol ngozhaw xaa ley cheen Ches, zee nzho mod kayaa Dios xaa, nzere xaa re kwaan chul kwaan sbaasa mzelazh Dios lo xaa, ¡nu tira nalet na kwaane! Sbaa nle xaa zee nanont ngut Jesucrist.
¡Xaa Galacia, xaa bxen! ¿Xomod mlaa gu mle nachan xaa yek gu? Klar doo mzaa nu kwent lo gu, xomod ngut Jesucrist, leezha mkee xaa xaa lo krus.
Nebse nzhekla na keb gu lo na: ¿Che mkayaa gu Mbi Naban cheen Dios, nel mbin gu kwaan nzhé ley cheen Ches, o nel mle gu krer wdizh chul kwaan mbin gu?
¿Chozhiin tant nachan gu? Mzelo gu mze gu xnaz Dios kwaan Mbi Naban, nu lee nal nzhekla gu zhin gu lo Dios kwaan yalngezh cheen myet yizhyo.
¿Che nik tub sirb namlet mded gu bid kwent cheen wdizh chul? ¡Wena, chol mleya sirb lo gu!
Leezha mzaa Dios Mbi Naban nu mle xaa re kwaan gro lo re gu, ¿chozhiin mle xaaya? Nanakta nel mle gu kwaan nzhé ley, mle xaaya nel mle gu krer wdizh chul kwaan mbin gu.
Snee mle Abraham, nel nkee lo Xkyech Dios, nzhé: “Abraham mwii lo Dios, kwaanzee Dios mkayaa xaa mod tub xaa nali”. [Gn. 15:6]
Nu kwaanzee nzhaal ne re gu, lee re dii cheen Abraham nak re xaa kwaan ngwii lo Dios.
Nu lo Xkyech Dios nzhéla lee Dios kayaa re xaa nanakt xaa Israel mod xaa nali lo xaa, re xaa kwaan ngwii lo Dios, nu nzhé xaa wdizh chul ne lo Abraham: “Kwent cheen lu, Dios le kwaan chul lo zyen doo xaa dubse yizhyo”. [Gn. 12:3]
Nu kwaanzee lee re xaa ngwii lo Dios chul yo xaa kwenta Abraham, xaa mwii lo Dios.
Rese xaa kwaan ngwii lo ley cheen Ches ded xaa bid nel Xkyech Dios nzhé: “Nxobde Dios re xaa kwaan nalet rese kwaan nkee lo yech cheen ley”. [Dt. 27:26]
Nu kwaanzee, klar doo niiya, nik tub xaa nakayaat Dios nel ngozhaw xaa ley cheen Ches, modxa nzhé Xkyech Dios: “Xaa nali nak xaa ngwii lo Dios”. [Hab. 2:4]
Per lee re xaa ngwii lo ley cheen Ches nangwiit xaa lo Dios, nel Xkyech Dios nzhé: “Xaa ngwii lo ley cheen Ches, nkin le xaa rese kwaan nkee lo ley cheen Ches”. [Lv. 18:5]
Jesucrist mdix re jwalt cheen be mod naab ley kwent lo be, nel mxobde Dios xaa kwent cheen re be, nel lee Xkyech Dios nzhé: “Dios nxobde rese xaa nzhet nkenga lo yag”. [Dt. 21:23]
Kwaanzee yo chul re xaa nanakt xaa Israel, mod mzaa Dios kwent lo Abraham yilo. Nu snee rese be, xaa ngwii lo Jesucrist, mkayaa Mbi Naban, modxa nzhé Dios xaal xaa.
Wech nu bzan, nii na lo gu mod xaa yizhyo ne: Leezha nle xaa tub trat nu nzaa xaa firm cheen xaa lo yech, nik tub xaa nyent mod cheeya o kee stub kwaan loya.
Sbaaka mlaa Dios wdizh lo Abraham nu lo dii cheen xaa. Lee Xkyech Dios nanzaat kwent cheen: “rese dii cheen xaa”. Leeya nzaa kwent cheen: “tubka dii cheen xaa”, [Gn. 17:8] xaa nak Jesucrist.
Lee kwaan nii na nak kwaane: Dios mlaa diizh lo Abraham, nu nzhé xaa le xaaya. Kwaanzee, lee ley cheen Ches, kwaan nyaad tap gayoo galbchii liin gwluzh, nyent mod lux wdizh zee, nu kiib yalnon lo kwaan nzhé Dios lo Abraham.
Nel chelee kwaan nzaa Dios lo be, zaa xaaya nel ngozhaw be ley, zee nanaktraya tub kwaan nguné xaa zaa xaa sbaasa. Per lee Dios nzaaya sbaasa nel sbaa nzhé xaa lo Abraham.
Kwaanzee, ¿cho sirb nle ley cheen Ches? Gwluzh Dios mzaaya zee ngok ngeda kwent cheen re jwalt cheen myet. Nu nebse nzhaal diiya axta gorna yaad xaa nak “dii” kwaan nzhé Dios yaad. Re mandad cheen Dios mzaa ley lo Ches, zee gak xaa tub xaa nzo xsaww lo Dios nu lo re xaa Dios.
